2425 * Initiallize all the GL stuff needed to render to screen
2426 * @private
2427 */
2428 GLGE.Group.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
2429 	this.gl=gl;
2430 	for(var i=0;i<this.children.length;i++){
2431 		if(this.children[i].GLInit){
2432 			this.children[i].GLInit(gl);
2433 		}
2434 	}
2435 }
2436 /**
2437 * Renders the group to the render buffer
2438 * @private
2439 */
2440 GLGE.Group.prototype.GLRender=function(gl,renderType){
2441 	//animate this object
2442 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT){
2443 		if(this.animation) this.animate();
2444 	}
2445 	if(!this.gl){
2446 		this.GLInit(gl);
2447 	}
2448 	for(var i=0;i<this.children.length;i++){
2449 		if(this.children[i].GLRender){
2450 			this.children[i].GLRender(gl,renderType);
2451 		}
2452 	}
2453 }
2454 
2455 
2456 closure_export();
2457  
2458 /**
2459 * @class Class defining a channel of animation for an action
2460 * @param {string} uid a unique reference string for this object
2461 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2462 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2463 */
2464 GLGE.ActionChannel=function(uid){
2465 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2466 }
2467 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.ActionChannel);
2468 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.ActionChannel);
2469 /**
2470 * Sets the name/object of the bone channel
2471 * @param {string} name the name of the bone channel
2472 */
2473 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.setTarget=function(object){
2474 	this.target=object;
2475 };
2476 /**
2477 * Sets the animation for this channel
2478 * @param {GLGE.AnimationVector} animation the animation vector for this channel
2479 */
2480 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.setAnimation=function(animation){
2481 	this.animation=animation;
2482 };
2483 /**
2484 * Gets the name/object of the bone channel
2485 * @returns {string} the name of the bone channel
2486 */
2487 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.getTarget=function(){
2488 	return this.target;
2489 };
2490 /**
2491 * Gets the animation vector for this channel
2492 * @returns {GLGE.AnimationVector} the animation vector for this channel
2493 */
2494 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.getAnimation=function(){
2495 	return this.animation;
2496 };
2497 
2498 /**
2499 * @class Class to describe and action on a skeleton
2500 * @param {string} uid a unique reference string for this object
2501 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2502 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2503 */
2504 GLGE.Action=function(uid){
2505 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2506 	this.channels=[];
2507 };
2508 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Action);
2509 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Action);
2510 /**
2511  * @name Action#animFinished
2512  * @event
2513  * @param {object} data
2514  */
2515 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.Action);
2516 
2517 /**
2518 * Starts playing the action
2519 */
2520 GLGE.Action.prototype.start=function(blendTime,loop,names){
2521 	if(!loop) loop=false;
2522 	if(!blendTime) blendTime=0;
2523 	var channels=this.channels;
2524 	var start=(new Date()).getTime();
2525 	this.animFinished=false;
2526 	
2527 	for(var i=0;i<channels.length;i++){
2528 		var animation=channels[i].getAnimation();
2529 		var action=this;
2530 		var channel=channels[i];
2531 		var target=channel.getTarget();
2532 		if(typeof target=="string"){
2533 			if(names && names[target]){
2534 				target=names[target];
2535 			}
2536 		}
2537 		var closure={};
2538 		closure.finishEvent=function(data){
2539 			target.removeEventListener("animFinished",closure.finishEvent);
2540 			if(!action.animFinished && target.animation==animation){
2541 				action.fireEvent("animFinished",{});
2542 				action.animFinished=true;
2543 			}
2544 		}
2545 		target.addEventListener("animFinished",closure.finishEvent);
2546 		
2547 		target.setAnimation(animation,blendTime,start);
2548 		target.setLoop(loop);
2549 
2550 	}
2551 };
2552 /**
2553 * Adds and action channel to this action
2554 * @param {GLGE.ActionChannel} channel the channel to be added
2555 */
2556 GLGE.Action.prototype.addActionChannel=function(channel){
2557 	this.channels.push(channel);
2558 	return this;
2559 };
2560 /**
2561 * Removes and action channel to this action
2562 * @param {GLGE.ActionChannel} channel the channel to be removed
2563 */
2564 GLGE.Action.prototype.removeActionChannel=function(channel){
2565 	for(var i=0;i<this.channels.length;i++){
2566 		if(this.channels[i]==channels){
2567 			this.channels.splice(i,1);
2568 			break;
2569 		}
2570 	}
2571 };
2572 
2573 
2574 
2575 /**
2576 * @class Text that can be rendered in a scene
2577 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
2578 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
2579 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2580 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2581 */
2582 GLGE.Text=function(uid){
2583 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2584 	this.canvas=document.createElement("canvas");
2585 	this.color={r:1.0,g:1.0,b:1.0};
2586 }
2587 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Text);
2588 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Text);
2589 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Text);
2590 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Text);
2591 GLGE.Text.prototype.className="Text";
2592 GLGE.Text.prototype.zTrans=true;
2593 GLGE.Text.prototype.canvas=null;
2594 GLGE.Text.prototype.aspect=1.0;
2595 GLGE.Text.prototype.color=null;
2596 GLGE.Text.prototype.text="";
2597 GLGE.Text.prototype.font="Times";
2598 GLGE.Text.prototype.size=100;
2599 GLGE.Text.prototype.pickType=GLGE.TEXT_TEXTPICK;
2600 
2601 /**
2602 * Gets the pick type for this text
2603 * @returns {string} the pick type
2604 */
2605 GLGE.Text.prototype.getPickType=function(){
2606 	return this.pickType;
2607 };
2608 /**
2609 * Sets the pick type GLGE.TEXT_BOXPICK for picking based on bound box or GLGE.TEXT_TEXTPICK for pixel perfect text picking
2610 * @param {Number} value the picking type
2611 */
2612 GLGE.Text.prototype.setPickType=function(value){
2613 	this.pickType=value;
2614 	return this;
2615 };
2616 /**
2617 * Gets the font of the text
2618 * @returns {string} the font of the text
2619 */
2620 GLGE.Text.prototype.getFont=function(){
2621 	return this.size;
2622 };
2623 /**
2624 * Sets the font of the text
2625 * @param {Number} value the font of the text
2626 */
2627 GLGE.Text.prototype.setFont=function(value){
2628 	this.font=value;
2629 	if(this.gl) this.updateCanvas(this.gl);
2630 	return this;
2631 };
2632 /**
2633 * Gets the size of the text
2634 * @returns {string} the size of the text
2635 */
2636 GLGE.Text.prototype.getSize=function(){
2637 	return this.size;
2638 };
2639 /**
2640 * Sets the size of the text
2641 * @param {Number} value the size of the text
2642 */
2643 GLGE.Text.prototype.setSize=function(value){
2644 	this.size=value;
2645 	if(this.gl) this.updateCanvas(this.gl);
2646 	return this;
2647 };
2648 /**
2649 * Gets the rendered text
2650 * @returns {string} the text rendered
2651 */
2652 GLGE.Text.prototype.getText=function(){
2653 	return this.text;
2654 };
2655 /**
2656 * Sets the text to be rendered
2657 * @param {Number} value the text to render
2658 */
2659 GLGE.Text.prototype.setText=function(value){
2660 	this.text=value;
2661 	if(this.gl) this.updateCanvas(this.gl);
2662 	return this;
2663 };
2664 /**
2665 * Sets the base colour of the text
2666 * @param {string} color The colour of the material
2667 */
2668 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColor=function(color){
2669 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
2670 	this.color={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
2671 	return this;
2672 };
2673 /**
2674 * Sets the red base colour of the text
2675 * @param {Number} r The new red level 0-1
2676 */
2677 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColorR=function(value){
2678 	this.color.r=value;
2679 	return this;
2680 };
2681 /**
2682 * Sets the green base colour of the text
2683 * @param {Number} g The new green level 0-1
2684 */
2685 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColorG=function(value){
2686 	this.color.g=value;
2687 	return this;
2688 };
2689 /**
2690 * Sets the blue base colour of the text
2691 * @param {Number} b The new blue level 0-1
2692 */
2693 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColorB=function(value){
2694 	this.color.b=value;
2695 	return this;
2696 };
2697 /**
2698 * Gets the current base color of the text
2699 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current base color
2700 */
2701 GLGE.Text.prototype.getColor=function(){
2702 	return this.color;
2703 	return this;
2704 };
2705 
2706 /**
2707 * Sets the Z Transparency of this text
2708 * @param {boolean} value Does this object need blending?
2709 */
2710 GLGE.Text.prototype.setZtransparent=function(value){
2711 	this.zTrans=value;
2712 	return this;
2713 }
2714 /**
2715 * Gets the z transparency
2716 * @returns boolean
2717 */
2718 GLGE.Text.prototype.isZtransparent=function(){
2719 	return this.zTrans;
2720 }
2721 /**
2722 * Creates the shader program for the object
2723 * @private
2724 */
2725 GLGE.Text.prototype.GLGenerateShader=function(gl){
2726 	if(this.GLShaderProgram) gl.deleteProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);
2727 
2728 	//Vertex Shader
2729 	var vertexStr="";
2730 	vertexStr+="attribute vec3 position;\n";
2731 	vertexStr+="attribute vec2 uvcoord;\n";
2732 	vertexStr+="varying vec2 texcoord;\n";
2733 	vertexStr+="uniform mat4 Matrix;\n";
2734 	vertexStr+="uniform mat4 PMatrix;\n";
2735 	vertexStr+="varying vec4 pos;\n";
2736 	
2737 	vertexStr+="void main(void){\n";
2738 	vertexStr+="texcoord=uvcoord;\n";    
2739 	vertexStr+="pos = Matrix * vec4(position,1.0);\n";
2740 	vertexStr+="gl_Position = PMatrix * pos;\n";
2741 	vertexStr+="}\n";
2742 	
2743 	//Fragment Shader
2744 	var fragStr="#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n";
2745 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE;\n";
2746 	fragStr=fragStr+"varying vec2 texcoord;\n";
2747 	fragStr=fragStr+"varying vec4 pos;\n";
2748 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform float far;\n";
2749 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform int picktype;\n";
2750 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform vec3 pickcolor;\n";
2751 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform vec3 color;\n";
2752 	fragStr=fragStr+"void main(void){\n";
2753 	fragStr=fragStr+"float alpha=texture2D(TEXTURE,texcoord).a;\n";
2754 	fragStr=fragStr+"if(picktype=="+GLGE.TEXT_BOXPICK+"){gl_FragColor = vec4(pickcolor,1.0);}"
2755 	fragStr=fragStr+"else if(picktype=="+GLGE.TEXT_TEXTPICK+"){gl_FragColor = vec4(pickcolor,alpha);}"
2756 	fragStr=fragStr+"else{gl_FragColor = vec4(color.rgb*alpha,alpha);};\n";
2757 	fragStr=fragStr+"}\n";
2758 	
2759 	this.GLFragmentShader=gl.createShader(gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER);
2760 	this.GLVertexShader=gl.createShader(gl.VERTEX_SHADER);
2761 
2762 
2763 	gl.shaderSource(this.GLFragmentShader, fragStr);
2764 	gl.compileShader(this.GLFragmentShader);
2765 	if (!gl.getShaderParameter(this.GLFragmentShader, gl.COMPILE_STATUS)) {
2766 	      GLGE.error(gl.getShaderInfoLog(this.GLFragmentShader));
2767 	      return;
2768 	}
2769 	
2770 	//set and compile the vertex shader
2771 	//need to set str
2772 	gl.shaderSource(this.GLVertexShader, vertexStr);
2773 	gl.compileShader(this.GLVertexShader);
2774 	if (!gl.getShaderParameter(this.GLVertexShader, gl.COMPILE_STATUS)) {
2775 		GLGE.error(gl.getShaderInfoLog(this.GLVertexShader));
2776 		return;
2777 	}
2778 	
2779 	this.GLShaderProgram = gl.createProgram();
2780 	gl.attachShader(this.GLShaderProgram, this.GLVertexShader);
2781 	gl.attachShader(this.GLShaderProgram, this.GLFragmentShader);
2782 	gl.linkProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);	
2783 }
2784 /**
2785 * Initiallize all the GL stuff needed to render to screen
2786 * @private
2787 */
2788 GLGE.Text.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
2789 	this.gl=gl;
2790 	this.createPlane(gl);
2791 	this.GLGenerateShader(gl);
2792 	
2793 	this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
2794 	this.updateCanvas(gl);
2795 }
2796 /**
2797 * Updates the canvas texture
2798 * @private
2799 */
2800 GLGE.Text.prototype.updateCanvas=function(gl){
2801 	var canvas = this.canvas;
2802 	canvas.width=1;
2803 	canvas.height=this.size*1.2;
2804 	var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
2805 	ctx.font = this.size+"px "+this.font;
2806 	canvas.width=ctx.measureText(this.text).width;
2807 	canvas.height=this.size*1.2;
2808 	 ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
2809 	ctx.textBaseline="top";
2810 	ctx.font = this.size+"px "+this.font;
2811 	this.aspect=canvas.width/canvas.height;
2812 	ctx.fillText(this.text, 0, 0);   
2813 	
2814 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
2815 	//TODO: fix this when minefield is upto spec
2816 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas);}
2817 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas,null);}
2818 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
2819 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
2820 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
2821 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
2822 }
2823 
2824 /**
2825 * Renders the text to the render buffer
2826 * @private
2827 */
2828 GLGE.Text.prototype.GLRender=function(gl,renderType,pickindex){
2829 	if(!this.gl){
2830 		this.GLInit(gl);
2831 	}
2832 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT || renderType==GLGE.RENDER_PICK){	
2833 		//if look at is set then look
2834 		if(this.lookAt) this.Lookat(this.lookAt);
2835 		
2836 		gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);
2837 
2838 		var attribslot;
2839 		//disable all the attribute initially arrays - do I really need this?
2840 		for(var i=0; i<8; i++) gl.disableVertexAttribArray(i);
2841 		attribslot=GLGE.getAttribLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "position");
2842 
2843 		gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.posBuffer);
2844 		gl.enableVertexAttribArray(attribslot);
2845 		gl.vertexAttribPointer(attribslot, this.posBuffer.itemSize, gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
2846 		
2847 		attribslot=GLGE.getAttribLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "uvcoord");
2848 		gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.uvBuffer);
2849 		gl.enableVertexAttribArray(attribslot);
2850 		gl.vertexAttribPointer(attribslot, this.uvBuffer.itemSize, gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
2851 		
2852 		gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE0"]);
2853 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
2854 		gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "TEXTURE"), 0);	
2855 		
2856 		if(!pickindex) pickindex=0;
2857 		var b = pickindex >> 16 & 0xFF; 
2858 		var g = pickindex >> 8 & 0xFF; 
2859 		var r = pickindex & 0xFF;
2860 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "pickcolor"), r/255,g/255,b/255);
2861 			
2862 		if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_PICK){
2863 			gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "picktype"), this.pickType);	
2864 		}else{
2865 			gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "picktype"), 0);	
2866 		}
2867 		
2868 		if(!this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays) this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays={};
2869 
2870 		
2871 		//generate and set the modelView matrix
2872 		var scalefactor=this.size/100;
2873 		var mMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(gl.scene.camera.getViewMatrix(),GLGE.mulMat4(this.getModelMatrix(),GLGE.scaleMatrix(this.aspect*scalefactor,scalefactor,scalefactor)));
2874 		var mUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "Matrix");
2875 		if(!this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix) this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix=new Float32Array(mMatrix);
2876 			else GLGE.mat4gl(mMatrix,this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix);
2877 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(mUniform, true, this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix);
2878 		
2879 		var mUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "PMatrix");
2880 
2881 		if(!this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix) this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix=new Float32Array(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix());
2882 			else GLGE.mat4gl(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix(),this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix);
2883 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(mUniform, true, this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix);
2884 
2885 		
2886 		var farUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "far");
2887 		gl.uniform1f(farUniform, gl.scene.camera.getFar());
2888 		//set the color
2889 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "color"), this.color.r,this.color.g,this.color.b);
2890 		
2891 		gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLfaces);
2892 		gl.drawElements(gl.TRIANGLES, this.GLfaces.numItems, gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
2893 	}
2894 }
2895 /**
2896 * creates the plane mesh to draw
2897 * @private
2898 */
2899 GLGE.Text.prototype.createPlane=function(gl){
2900 	//create the vertex positions
2901 	if(!this.posBuffer) this.posBuffer = gl.createBuffer();
2902 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.posBuffer);
2903 	gl.bufferData(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array([1,1,0,-1,1,0,-1,-1,0,1,-1,0]), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
2904 	this.posBuffer.itemSize = 3;
2905 	this.posBuffer.numItems = 4;
2906 	//create the vertex uv coords
2907 	if(!this.uvBuffer) this.uvBuffer = gl.createBuffer();
2908 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.uvBuffer);
2909 	gl.bufferData(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array([0,0,1,0,1,1,0,1]), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
2910 	this.uvBuffer.itemSize = 2;
2911 	this.uvBuffer.numItems = 4;
2912 	//create the faces
2913 	if(!this.GLfaces) this.GLfaces = gl.createBuffer();
2914 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLfaces);
2915 	gl.bufferData(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, new Uint16Array([0,1,2,2,3,0]), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
2916 	this.GLfaces.itemSize = 1;
2917 	this.GLfaces.numItems = 6;
2918 }
2919 
2920 
2921 
2922 /**
2923 * @class Creates a new mesh/material to add to an object
2924 * @param {GLGE.Mesh} mesh optional mesh
2925 * @param {GLGE.Material} material optional material
2926 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2927 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2928 */
2929 GLGE.MultiMaterial=function(uid){
2930 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2931 }
2932 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.MultiMaterial);
2933 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.MultiMaterial);
2934 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.mesh=null;
2935 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.className="MultiMaterial";
2936 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.material=null;
2937 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.program=null;
2938 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.GLShaderProgramPick=null;
2939 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.GLShaderProgramShadow=null;
2940 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.GLShaderProgram=null;
2941 /**
2942 * sets the mesh
2943 * @param {GLGE.Mesh} mesh 
2944 */
2945 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.setMesh=function(mesh){
2946 	if(typeof mesh=="string")  mesh=GLGE.Assets.get(mesh);
2947 	
2948 	//remove event listener from current material
2949 	if(this.mesh){
2950 		this.mesh.removeEventListener("shaderupdate",this.meshupdated);
2951 	}
2952 	var multiMaterial=this;
2953 	this.meshupdated=function(event){
2954 		multiMaterial.GLShaderProgram=null;
2955 	};
2956 	//set event listener for new material
2957 	mesh.addEventListener("shaderupdate",this.meshupdated);
2958 	
2959 	this.GLShaderProgram=null;
2960 	this.mesh=mesh;
2961 	return this;
2962 }
2963 /**
2964 * gets the mesh
2965 * @returns {GLGE.Mesh}
2966 */
2967 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.getMesh=function(){
2968 	return this.mesh;
2969 }
2970 /**
2971 * sets the material
2972 * @param {GLGE.Material} material 
2973 */
2974 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.setMaterial=function(material){
2975 	if(typeof material=="string")  material=GLGE.Assets.get(material);
2976 	
2977 	//remove event listener from current material
2978 	if(this.material){
2979 		this.material.removeEventListener("shaderupdate",this.materialupdated);
2980 	}
2981 	var multiMaterial=this;
2982 	this.materialupdated=function(event){
2983 		multiMaterial.GLShaderProgram=null;
2984 	};
2985 	//set event listener for new material
2986 	material.addEventListener("shaderupdate",this.materialupdated);
2987 	
2988 	this.GLShaderProgram=null;
2989 	this.material=material;
2990 	return this;
2991 }
2992 /**
2993 * gets the material
2994 * @returns {GLGE.Material}
2995 */
2996 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.getMaterial=function(){
2997 	return this.material;
2998 }
2999 
3000 
3001 /**
3002 * @class An additional instance of an object that can be rendered in a scene
3003 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
3004 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
3005 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3006 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3007 */
3008 GLGE.ObjectInstance=function(uid){
3009 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3010 }
3011 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3012 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3013 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3014 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3015 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.parentObject=null;
3016 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.className="ObjectInstance";
3017 /**
3018 * Sets the parent object to instance
3019 * @param {GLGE.Object} value the object to instance
3020 */
3021 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.setObject=function(value){
3022 	if(this.parentObject) this.parentObject.removeInstance(this);
3023 	this.parentObject=value;
3024 	value.addInstance(this);
3025 	return this;
3026 }
3027 /**
3028 * Gets the Object being instanced
3029 * @returns boolean
3030 */
3031 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.getObject=function(){
3032 	return this.parentObject;
3033 }
3034 
3035 
3036 
3037 
3038 /**
3039 * @class An object that can be rendered in a scene
3040 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
3041 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
3042 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3043 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3044 */
3045 GLGE.Object=function(uid){
3046 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3047 	this.multimaterials=[];
3048 	this.instances=[];
3049 }
3050 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Object);
3051 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Object);
3052 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Object);
3053 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Object);
3054 GLGE.Object.prototype.className="Object";
3055 GLGE.Object.prototype.mesh=null;
3056 GLGE.Object.prototype.skeleton=null;
3057 GLGE.Object.prototype.scene=null;
3058 GLGE.Object.prototype.transformMatrix=GLGE.identMatrix();
3059 GLGE.Object.prototype.material=null;
3060 GLGE.Object.prototype.gl=null;
3061 GLGE.Object.prototype.multimaterials=null;
3062 GLGE.Object.prototype.instances=null;
3063 GLGE.Object.prototype.zTrans=false;
3064 GLGE.Object.prototype.id="";
3065 GLGE.Object.prototype.pickable=true;
3066 
3067 //shadow fragment
3068 var shfragStr=[];
3069 shfragStr.push("#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n");
3070 shfragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3071 shfragStr.push("{\n");
3072 shfragStr.push("vec4 rgba=fract((gl_FragCoord.z/gl_FragCoord.w)/10000.0 * vec4(16777216.0, 65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3073 shfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=rgba-rgba.rrgb*vec4(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625,0.00390625);\n");
3074 shfragStr.push("}\n");
3075 GLGE.Object.prototype.shfragStr=shfragStr.join("");
3076 
3077 //normal fragment
3078 var nfragStr=[];
3079 nfragStr.push("#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n");
3080 nfragStr.push("varying vec3 n;\n");
3081 nfragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3082 nfragStr.push("{\n");
3083 nfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(n,1.0);\n");
3084 nfragStr.push("}\n");
3085 GLGE.Object.prototype.nfragStr=nfragStr.join("");
3086 
3087 //picking fragment
3088 var pkfragStr=[];
3089 pkfragStr.push("#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n");
3090 pkfragStr.push("uniform float far;\n");
3091 pkfragStr.push("uniform vec3 pickcolor;\n");
3092 pkfragStr.push("varying vec3 n;\n");
3093 pkfragStr.push("varying vec4 UVCoord;\n");
3094 pkfragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3095 pkfragStr.push("{\n");
3096 pkfragStr.push("float Xcoord = gl_FragCoord.x+0.5;\n");
3097 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>0.0) gl_FragColor = vec4(pickcolor,1.0);\n");
3098 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>1.0) gl_FragColor = vec4(n,1.0);\n");
3099 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>2.0){");	
3100 pkfragStr.push("vec3 rgb=fract((gl_FragCoord.z/gl_FragCoord.w) * vec3(65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3101 pkfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(rgb-rgb.rrg*vec3(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625),1.0);\n");
3102 pkfragStr.push("}");
3103 //x tex coord
3104 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>3.0){");	
3105 pkfragStr.push("vec3 rgb=fract(UVCoord.x * vec3(65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3106 pkfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(rgb-rgb.rrg*vec3(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625),1.0);\n");
3107 pkfragStr.push("}");
3108 //y tex coord
3109 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>4.0){");	
3110 pkfragStr.push("vec3 rgb=fract(UVCoord.y * vec3(65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3111 pkfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(rgb-rgb.rrg*vec3(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625),1.0);\n");
3112 pkfragStr.push("}");
3113 pkfragStr.push("}\n");
3114 GLGE.Object.prototype.pkfragStr=pkfragStr.join("");
3115 
3116 /**
3117 * Gets the objects skeleton
3118 * @returns GLGE.Group
3119 */
3120 GLGE.Object.prototype.getSkeleton=function(){
3121 	return this.skeleton;
3122 }
3123 /**
3124 * Sets the objects skeleton
3125 * @param {GLGE.Group} value the skeleton group to set
3126 */
3127 GLGE.Object.prototype.setSkeleton=function(value){
3128 	this.skeleton=value;
3129 	this.bones=value.getNames();
3130 	return this;
3131 }
3132 
3133 GLGE.Object.prototype.getBoundingVolume=function(){
3134 	var multimaterials=this.multimaterials;
3135 	this.boundingVolume=new GLGE.BoundingVolume(0,0,0,0,0,0);
3136 	for(var i=0;i<multimaterials.length;i++){
3137 		this.boundingVolume.addBoundingVolume(multimaterials[i].mesh.getBoundingVolume());
3138 	}
3139 	this.boundingVolume.applyMatrixScale(this.getModelMatrix());
3140 
3141 	return this.boundingVolume;
3142 }
3143 
3144 /**
3145 * Sets the Z Transparency of this object
3146 * @param {boolean} value Does this object need blending?
3147 */
3148 GLGE.Object.prototype.setZtransparent=function(value){
3149 	this.zTrans=value;
3150 	return this;
3151 }
3152 /**
3153 * Gets the z transparency
3154 * @returns boolean
3155 */
3156 GLGE.Object.prototype.isZtransparent=function(){
3157 	return this.zTrans;
3158 }
3159 
3160 /**
3161 * Adds a new instance of this object
3162 * @param {GLGE.ObjectInstance} value the instance to add
3163 */
3164 GLGE.Object.prototype.addInstance=function(value){
3165 	this.instances.push(value);
3166 	return this;
3167 }
3168 
3169 /**
3170 * Removes an instance of this object
3171 * @param {GLGE.ObjectInstance} value the instance to remove
3172 */
3173 GLGE.Object.prototype.removeInstance=function(value){
3174 	for(var i=0; i<this.instances;i++){
3175 		if(this.instance==value) this.instances.splice(i);
3176 	}
3177 }
3178 
3179 /**
3180 * Sets the material associated with the object
3181 * @param GLGE.Material
3182 */
3183 GLGE.Object.prototype.setMaterial=function(material,idx){
3184 	if(typeof material=="string")  material=GLGE.Assets.get(material);
3185 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3186 	if(!this.multimaterials[idx]) this.multimaterials[idx]=new GLGE.MultiMaterial();
3187 	if(this.multimaterials[idx].getMaterial()!=material){
3188 		this.multimaterials[idx].setMaterial(material);
3189 		this.updateProgram();
3190 	}
3191 	return this;
3192 }
3193 /**
3194 * Gets the material associated with the object
3195 * @returns GLGE.Material
3196 */
3197 GLGE.Object.prototype.getMaterial=function(idx){
3198 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3199 	if(this.multimaterials[idx]) {
3200 		return this.multimaterials[idx].getMaterial();
3201 	}else{
3202 		return false;
3203 	}
3204 }
3205 /**
3206 * Sets the mesh associated with the object
3207 * @param GLGE.Mesh
3208 */
3209 GLGE.Object.prototype.setMesh=function(mesh,idx){
3210 	if(typeof mesh=="string")  mesh=GLGE.Assets.get(mesh);
3211 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3212 	if(!this.multimaterials[idx]) this.multimaterials.push(new GLGE.MultiMaterial());
3213 	this.multimaterials[idx].setMesh(mesh);
3214 	return this;
3215 }
3216 /**
3217 * Gets the mesh associated with the object
3218 * @returns GLGE.Mesh
3219 */
3220 GLGE.Object.prototype.getMesh=function(idx){
3221 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3222 	if(this.multimaterials[idx]) {
3223 		this.multimaterials[idx].getMesh();
3224 	}else{
3225 		return false;
3226 	}
3227 }
3228 /**
3229 * Initiallize all the GL stuff needed to render to screen
3230 * @private
3231 */
3232 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
3233 	this.gl=gl;
3234 }
3235 /**
3236 * Cleans up all the GL stuff we sets
3237 * @private
3238 */
3239 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLDestory=function(gl){
3240 }
3241 /**
3242 * Updates the GL shader program for the object
3243 * @private
3244 */
3245 GLGE.Object.prototype.updateProgram=function(){
3246 	for(var i=0; i<this.multimaterials.length;i++){
3247 		this.multimaterials[i].GLShaderProgram=null;
3248 	}
3249 }
3250 /**
3251 * Adds another material to this object
3252 * @returns GLGE.Material
3253 */
3254 GLGE.Object.prototype.addMultiMaterial=function(multimaterial){
3255 	if(typeof multimaterial=="string")  multimaterial=GLGE.Assets.get(multimaterial);
3256 	this.multimaterials.push(multimaterial);
3257 }
3258 /**
3259 * gets all of the objects materials and meshes
3260 * @returns array of GLGE.MultiMaterial objects
3261 */
3262 GLGE.Object.prototype.getMultiMaterials=function(){
3263 	return this.multimaterials;
3264 }
3265 /**
3266 * Creates the shader program for the object
3267 * @private
3268 */
3269 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLGenerateShader=function(gl){
3270 	//create the programs strings
3271 	//Vertex Shader
3272 	var UV=joints1=joints2=false;
3273 	var lights=gl.lights;
3274 	var vertexStr=[];
3275 	var tangent=false;
3276 	if(!this.mesh.normals) this.mesh.calcNormals();
3277 	for(var i=0;i<this.mesh.buffers.length;i++){
3278 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="tangent") tangent=true;
3279 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].size>1){
3280 			vertexStr.push("attribute vec"+this.mesh.buffers[i].size+" "+this.mesh.buffers[i].name+";\n");
3281 		}else{
3282 			vertexStr.push("attribute float "+this.mesh.buffers[i].name+";\n");
3283 		}
3284 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="UV") UV=true;
3285 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="joints1") joints1=this.mesh.buffers[i];
3286 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="joints2") joints2=this.mesh.buffers[i];
3287 	}
3288 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 worldView;\n");
3289 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 projection;\n");  
3290 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 view;\n");  
3291 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 worldInverseTranspose;\n");
3292 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 envMat;\n");
3293 
3294 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3295 			vertexStr.push("uniform vec3 lightpos"+i+";\n");
3296 			vertexStr.push("uniform vec3 lightdir"+i+";\n");
3297 			vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 lightmat"+i+";\n");
3298 			vertexStr.push("varying vec4 spotcoord"+i+";\n");
3299 	}
3300 	
3301 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 eyevec;\n"); 
3302 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3303 			vertexStr.push("varying vec3 lightvec"+i+";\n"); 
3304 			vertexStr.push("varying vec3 tlightvec"+i+";\n"); 
3305 			vertexStr.push("varying float lightdist"+i+";\n"); 
3306 	}
3307 	
3308 	if(this.mesh.joints && this.mesh.joints.length>0){
3309 		vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 jointMat["+(this.mesh.joints.length)+"];\n"); 
3310 		vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 jointNMat["+(this.mesh.joints.length)+"];\n"); 
3311 	}
3312 	
3313 	if(this.material) vertexStr.push(this.material.getVertexVarying(vertexStr));
3314     
3315 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 n;\n");  
3316 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 b;\n");  
3317 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 t;\n");  
3318 	
3319 	vertexStr.push("varying vec4 UVCoord;\n");
3320 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 OBJCoord;\n");
3321 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 tang;\n");
3322 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 teyevec;\n");
3323 	
3324 	vertexStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3325 	vertexStr.push("{\n");
3326 	if(UV) vertexStr.push("UVCoord=UV;\n");
3327 	vertexStr.push("OBJCoord = position;\n");
3328 	vertexStr.push("vec4 pos = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);\n");
3329 	vertexStr.push("vec4 norm = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);\n");
3330 	vertexStr.push("vec4 tang4 = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);\n");
3331 	
3332 	if(joints1){
3333 		if(joints1.size==1){
3334 			vertexStr.push("pos += jointMat[int(joints1)]*vec4(position,1.0)*weights1;\n");
3335 			vertexStr.push("norm += jointNMat[int(joints1)]*vec4(normal,1.0)*weights1;\n");  
3336 			if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang4 +=  jointNMat[int(joints1)]*vec4(tangent,1.0)*weights1;\n");
3337 		}else{
3338 			for(var i=0;i<joints1.size;i++){
3339 				vertexStr.push("pos += jointMat[int(joints1["+i+"])]*vec4(position,1.0)*weights1["+i+"];\n");
3340 				vertexStr.push("norm += jointNMat[int(joints1["+i+"])]*vec4(normal,1.0)*weights1["+i+"];\n");  
3341 				if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang4 +=  jointNMat[int(joints1["+i+"])]*vec4(tangent,1.0)*weights1["+i+"];\n");
3342 			}
3343 		}
3344 		if(joints2){
3345 			if(joints2.size==1){
3346 				vertexStr.push("pos += jointMat[int(joints2)]*vec4(position,1.0)*weights2;\n");
3347 				vertexStr.push("norm += jointNMat[int(joints2)]*vec4(normal,1.0)*weights2;\n");  
3348 				if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang4 +=  jointNMat[int(joints2)]*vec4(tangent,1.0)*weights2;\n");
3349 			}else{
3350 				for(var i=0;i<joints2.size;i++){
3351 					vertexStr.push("pos += jointMat[int(joints2["+i+"])]*vec4(position,1.0)*weights2["+i+"];\n");
3352 					vertexStr.push("norm += jointNMat[int(joints2["+i+"])]*vec4(normal,1.0)*weights2["+i+"];\n");  
3353 					if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang4 +=  jointNMat[int(joints2["+i+"])]*vec4(tangent,1.0)*weights2["+i+"];\n");
3354 				}
3355 			}
3356 		}
3357 		
3358 		for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3359 			vertexStr.push("spotcoord"+i+"=lightmat"+i+"*vec4(pos.xyz,1.0);\n");
3360 		}
3361 		vertexStr.push("pos = worldView * vec4(pos.xyz, 1.0);\n");
3362 		vertexStr.push("norm = worldInverseTranspose * vec4(norm.xyz, 1.0);\n");
3363 		if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang = (worldInverseTranspose*vec4(tang4.xyz,1.0)).xyz;\n");
3364 	}else{	
3365 		for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3366 			vertexStr.push("spotcoord"+i+"=lightmat"+i+"*vec4(position,1.0);\n");
3367 		}
3368 		vertexStr.push("pos = worldView * vec4(position, 1.0);\n");
3369 		vertexStr.push("norm = worldInverseTranspose * vec4(normal, 1.0);\n");  
3370 		if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang = (worldInverseTranspose*vec4(tangent,1.0)).xyz;\n");
3371 	}
3372     
3373 	vertexStr.push("gl_Position = projection * pos;\n");
3374 	vertexStr.push("eyevec = -pos.xyz;\n");
3375 	
3376 	vertexStr.push("t = normalize(tang);");
3377 	vertexStr.push("n = normalize(norm.rgb);");
3378 	vertexStr.push("b = normalize(cross(n,t));");
3379 	if(tangent){
3380 		vertexStr.push("teyevec.x = dot(eyevec, t);");
3381 		vertexStr.push("teyevec.y = dot(eyevec, b);");
3382 		vertexStr.push("teyevec.z = dot(eyevec, n);");
3383 	}else{
3384 		vertexStr.push("teyevec = eyevec;");
3385 	}
3386 	
3387 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){			
3388 			if(lights[i].getType()==GLGE.L_DIR){
3389 				vertexStr.push("vec3 tmplightvec"+i+" = -lightdir"+i+";\n");
3390 			}else{
3391 				vertexStr.push("vec3 tmplightvec"+i+" = -(lightpos"+i+"-pos.xyz);\n");
3392 			}
3393 			//tan space stuff
3394 			if(tangent){
3395 				vertexStr.push("tlightvec"+i+".x = dot(tmplightvec"+i+", t);");
3396 				vertexStr.push("tlightvec"+i+".y = dot(tmplightvec"+i+", b);");
3397 				vertexStr.push("tlightvec"+i+".z = dot(tmplightvec"+i+", n);");
3398 				
3399 			}else{
3400 				vertexStr.push("tlightvec"+i+" = tmplightvec"+i+";");
3401 			}
3402 			vertexStr.push("lightvec"+i+" = tmplightvec"+i+";");
3403 
3404 			
3405 			vertexStr.push("lightdist"+i+" = length(lightpos"+i+".xyz-pos.xyz);\n");
3406 	}
3407 	if(this.material) vertexStr.push(this.material.getLayerCoords(vertexStr));
3408 	vertexStr.push("}\n");
3409 	
3410 	vertexStr=vertexStr.join("");
3411 
3412 	//Fragment Shader
3413 	if(!this.material){
3414 		var fragStr=[];
3415 		fragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3416 		fragStr.push("{\n");
3417 		fragStr.push("gl_FragColor = vec4(1.0,1.0,1.0,1.0);\n");
3418 		fragStr.push("}\n");
3419 		fragStr=fragStr.join("");
3420 	}
3421 	else
3422 	{
3423 		fragStr=this.material.getFragmentShader(lights);
3424 	}
3425 	
3426 	this.GLFragmentShaderNormal=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,this.nfragStr);
3427 	this.GLFragmentShaderShadow=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,this.shfragStr);
3428 	this.GLFragmentShaderPick=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,this.pkfragStr);
3429 	this.GLFragmentShader=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,fragStr);
3430 	this.GLVertexShader=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.VERTEX_SHADER,vertexStr);
3431 
3432 	this.GLShaderProgramPick=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShaderPick);
3433 	this.GLShaderProgramShadow=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShaderShadow);
3434 	this.GLShaderProgramNormal=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShaderNormal);
3435 	this.GLShaderProgram=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShader);
3436 }
3437 /**
3438 * creates shader programs;
3439 * @param multimaterial the multimaterial object to create the shader programs for
3440 * @private
3441 */
3442 GLGE.Object.prototype.createShaders=function(multimaterial){
3443 	if(this.gl){
3444 		this.mesh=multimaterial.mesh;
3445 		this.material=multimaterial.material;
3446 		this.GLGenerateShader(this.gl);
3447 		multimaterial.GLShaderProgramPick=this.GLShaderProgramPick;
3448 		multimaterial.GLShaderProgramShadow=this.GLShaderProgramShadow;
3449 		multimaterial.GLShaderProgram=this.GLShaderProgram;
3450 	}
3451 }
3452 /**
3453 * Sets the shader program uniforms ready for rendering
3454 * @private
3455 */
3456 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLUniforms=function(gl,renderType,pickindex){
3457 	var program;
3458 	switch(renderType){
3459 		case GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT:
3460 			program=this.GLShaderProgram;
3461 			break;
3462 		case GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW:
3463 			program=this.GLShaderProgramShadow;
3464 			break;
3465 		case GLGE.RENDER_NORMAL:
3466 			program=this.GLShaderProgramNormal;
3467 			break;
3468 		case GLGE.RENDER_PICK:
3469 			program=this.GLShaderProgramPick;
3470 			var b = pickindex >> 16 & 0xFF; 
3471 			var g = pickindex >> 8 & 0xFF; 
3472 			var r = pickindex & 0xFF;
3473 			gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "pickcolor"), r/255,g/255,b/255);
3474 			break;
3475 	}
3476 	
3477 	
3478 	if(!program.caches) program.caches={};
3479 	if(!program.glarrays) program.glarrays={};
3480 
3481 	if(program.caches.far!=gl.scene.camera.far){
3482 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "far"), gl.scene.camera.far);
3483 		program.caches.far=gl.scene.camera.far;
3484 	}
3485 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT){
3486 		if(program.caches.ambientColor!=gl.scene.ambientColor){
3487 			gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "amb"), gl.scene.ambientColor.r,gl.scene.ambientColor.g,gl.scene.ambientColor.b);
3488 			program.caches.ambientColor=gl.scene.ambientColor;
3489 		}
3490 		if(program.caches.fogFar!=gl.scene.fogFar){
3491 			gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fogfar"), gl.scene.fogFar);
3492 			program.caches.fogFar=gl.scene.fogFar;
3493 		}
3494 		if(program.caches.fogNear!=gl.scene.fogNear){
3495 			gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fognear"), gl.scene.fogNear);
3496 			program.caches.fogNear=gl.scene.fogNear;
3497 		}
3498 		if(program.caches.fogType!=gl.scene.fogType){
3499 			gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fogtype"), gl.scene.fogType);
3500 			program.caches.fogType=gl.scene.fogType;
3501 		}
3502 		if(program.caches.fogType!=gl.scene.fogcolor){
3503 			gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fogcolor"), gl.scene.fogColor.r,gl.scene.fogColor.g,gl.scene.fogColor.b);
3504 			program.caches.fogcolor=gl.scene.fogcolor;
3505 		}
3506 	}
3507 
3508 			
3509 	
3510 	var cameraMatrix=gl.scene.camera.getViewMatrix();
3511 	var modelMatrix=this.getModelMatrix();
3512 	if(!program.caches.mvMatrix) program.caches.mvMatrix={cameraMatrix:null,modelMatrix:null};
3513 	var mvCache=program.caches.mvMatrix;
3514 	
3515 	if(mvCache.camerMatrix!=cameraMatrix || mvCache.modelMatrix!=modelMatrix){
3516 		try{
3517 		//generate and set the modelView matrix
3518 		if(!this.caches.mvMatrix) this.caches.mvMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,modelMatrix);
3519 		mvMatrix=this.caches.mvMatrix;
3520 					
3521 		var mvUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "worldView");
3522 		if(!program.glarrays.mvMatrix) program.glarrays.mvMatrix=new Float32Array(mvMatrix);
3523 			else GLGE.mat4gl(mvMatrix,program.glarrays.mvMatrix);
3524 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(mvUniform, true, program.glarrays.mvMatrix);
3525 
3526 	    
3527 		//invCamera matrix
3528 		if(!this.caches.envMat){
3529 			var envMat = GLGE.inverseMat4(mvMatrix);
3530 			envMat[3]=0;
3531 			envMat[7]=0;
3532 			envMat[11]=0;
3533 			this.caches.envMat = envMat;
3534 		}
3535 		envMat=this.caches.envMat;
3536 		var icUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "envMat");
3537 		
3538 		if(!program.glarrays.envMat) program.glarrays.envMat=new Float32Array(envMat);
3539 			else GLGE.mat4gl(envMat,program.glarrays.envMat);	
3540 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(icUniform, true, program.glarrays.envMat);
3541 	    
3542 		//normalising matrix
3543 		if(!this.caches.normalMatrix){
3544 			var normalMatrix = GLGE.inverseMat4(mvMatrix);
3545 			this.caches.normalMatrix = normalMatrix;
3546 		}
3547 		normalMatrix=this.caches.normalMatrix;
3548 		var nUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "worldInverseTranspose");
3549 		
3550 		if(!program.glarrays.normalMatrix) program.glarrays.normalMatrix=new Float32Array(normalMatrix);
3551 			else GLGE.mat4gl(normalMatrix,program.glarrays.normalMatrix);	
3552 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(nUniform, false, program.glarrays.normalMatrix);
3553 		
3554 		var cUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "view");
3555 		if(!program.glarrays.cameraMatrix) program.glarrays.cameraMatrix=new Float32Array(cameraMatrix);
3556 			else GLGE.mat4gl(cameraMatrix,program.glarrays.cameraMatrix);	
3557 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(cUniform, true, program.glarrays.cameraMatrix);
3558 		
3559 		mvCache.camerMatrix=cameraMatrix;
3560 		mvCache.modelMatrix!=modelMatrix;
3561 		}catch(e){}
3562 	}
3563 	
3564 	try{
3565 	var pUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "projection");
3566 	if(!program.glarrays.pMatrix) program.glarrays.pMatrix=new Float32Array(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix());
3567 			else GLGE.mat4gl(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix(),program.glarrays.pMatrix);	
3568 	gl.uniformMatrix4fv(pUniform, true, program.glarrays.pMatrix);
3569 	}catch(e){}
3570 	
3571 	//light
3572 	//dont' need lighting for picking
3573 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT){
3574 		var pos,lpos;
3575 		var lights=gl.lights
3576 		if(!program.caches.lights) program.caches.lights=[];
3577 		if(!program.glarrays.lights) program.glarrays.lights=[];
3578 		if(!this.caches.lights) this.caches.lights=[];
3579 		var lightCache=program.caches.lights;
3580 		for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3581 			if(!lightCache[i]) lightCache[i]={modelMatrix:null,cameraMatrix:null};
3582 			if(lightCache[i].modelMatrix!=modelMatrix || lightCache[i].cameraMatrix!=cameraMatrix){
3583 				if(!this.caches.lights[i])this.caches.lights[i]={};
3584 				
3585 				if(!this.caches.lights[i].pos) this.caches.lights[i].pos=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,lights[i].getModelMatrix()),[0,0,0,1]);
3586 				pos=this.caches.lights[i].pos;
3587 				gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "lightpos"+i), pos[0],pos[1],pos[2]);		
3588 				
3589 				
3590 				if(!this.caches.lights[i].lpos) this.caches.lights[i].lpos=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,lights[i].getModelMatrix()),[0,0,1,1]);
3591 				lpos=this.caches.lights[i].lpos;
3592 				gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "lightdir"+i),lpos[0]-pos[0],lpos[1]-pos[1],lpos[2]-pos[2]);
3593 				
3594 				if(lights[i].s_cache){
3595 					try{
3596 					var lightmat=GLGE.mulMat4(lights[i].s_cache.smatrix,modelMatrix);
3597 					if(!program.glarrays.lights[i]) program.glarrays.lights[i]=new Float32Array(lightmat);
3598 						else GLGE.mat4gl(lightmat,program.glarrays.lights[i]);
3599 					gl.uniformMatrix4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "lightmat"+i), true,program.glarrays.lights[i]);
3600 					lightCache[i].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
3601 					lightCache[i].cameraMatrix=cameraMatrix;
3602 					}catch(e){}
3603 				}else{
3604 					lightCache[i].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
3605 					lightCache[i].cameraMatrix=cameraMatrix;
3606 				}
3607 			}
3608 		}
3609 	}
3610 	
3611 	if(this.mesh.joints){
3612 		if(!program.caches.joints) program.caches.joints=[];
3613 		if(!program.glarrays.joints) program.glarrays.joints=[];
3614 		if(!program.glarrays.jointsinv) program.glarrays.jointsinv=[];
3615 		var jointCache=program.caches.joints;
3616 			var ident=GLGE.identMatrix();
3617 			for(i=0;i<this.mesh.joints.length;i++){
3618 			if(!jointCache[i]) jointCache[i]={modelMatrix:null,invBind:null};
3619 			if(typeof this.mesh.joints[i]=="string"){
3620 				if(this.bones){
3621 					var modelMatrix=this.bones[this.mesh.joints[i]].getModelMatrix();
3622 				}
3623 			}else{
3624 				var modelMatrix=this.mesh.joints[i].getModelMatrix();
3625 			}
3626 			var invBind=this.mesh.invBind[i];
3627 			if(jointCache[i].modelMatrix!=modelMatrix || jointCache[i].invBind!=invBind){
3628 				try{
3629 						var jointmat=GLGE.mulMat4(modelMatrix,invBind);
3630 						if(!program.glarrays.joints[i]) program.glarrays.joints[i]=new Float32Array(jointmat);
3631 							else GLGE.mat4gl(jointmat,program.glarrays.joints[i]);		
3632 						if(!program.glarrays.jointsinv[i]) program.glarrays.jointsinv[i]=new Float32Array(GLGE.inverseMat4(jointmat));
3633 							else GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.inverseMat4(jointmat),program.glarrays.jointsinv[i]);						
3634 						gl.uniformMatrix4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "jointMat["+i+"]"), true,program.glarrays.joints[i]);
3635 						gl.uniformMatrix4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "jointNMat["+i+"]"), false,program.glarrays.jointsinv[i]);
3636 						jointCache[i].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
3637 						jointCache[i].invBind=invBind;
3638 				}catch(e){}
3639 			}
3640 		}
3641 	}
3642 
3643     
3644 	if(this.material && renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT) this.material.textureUniforms(gl,program,lights,this);
3645 }
3646 /**
3647 * Renders the object to the screen
3648 * @private
3649 */
3650 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLRender=function(gl,renderType,pickindex){
3651 	if(!this.gl) this.GLInit(gl);
3652 	
3653 	//if look at is set then look
3654 	if(this.lookAt) this.Lookat(this.lookAt);
3655  
3656 	//animate this object
3657 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT){
3658 		if(this.animation) this.animate();
3659 	}
3660 	this.caches={};
3661 	for(var n=0;n<this.instances.length;n++){
3662 		this.instances[n].caches={};
3663 	}
3664 	
3665 	for(var i=0; i<this.multimaterials.length;i++){
3666 		if(this.multimaterials[i].mesh && this.multimaterials[i].mesh.loaded){
3667 			if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_NULL){
3668 				if(this.multimaterials[i].material) this.multimaterials[i].material.registerPasses(gl,this);
3669 				break;
3670 			}
3671 			if(!this.multimaterials[i].GLShaderProgram){
3672 				this.createShaders(this.multimaterials[i]);
3673 			}else{
3674 				this.GLShaderProgramPick=this.multimaterials[i].GLShaderProgramPick;
3675 				this.GLShaderProgramShadow=this.multimaterials[i].GLShaderProgramShadow;
3676 				this.GLShaderProgram=this.multimaterials[i].GLShaderProgram;
3677 			}
3678 			this.mesh=this.multimaterials[i].mesh;
3679 			this.material=this.multimaterials[i].material;
3680  
3681 			switch(renderType){
3682 				case  GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT:
3683 					gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);
3684 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgram);
3685 					break;
3686 				case  GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW:
3687 					gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgramShadow);
3688 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgramShadow);
3689 					break;
3690 				case  GLGE.RENDER_NORMAL:
3691 					gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgramNormal);
3692 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgramNormal);
3693 					break;
3694 				case  GLGE.RENDER_PICK:
3695 					gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgramPick);
3696 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgramPick);
3697 					break;
3698 			}
3699 			//render the object
3700 			this.GLUniforms(gl,renderType,pickindex);
3701 			gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.mesh.GLfaces);
3702 			gl.drawElements(gl.TRIANGLES, this.mesh.GLfaces.numItems, gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
3703 				
3704 			var matrix=this.matrix;
3705 			var caches=this.caches;
3706 			for(var n=0;n<this.instances.length;n++){
3707 				this.matrix=this.instances[n].getModelMatrix();
3708 				this.caches=this.instances[n].caches;
3709 				this.GLUniforms(gl,renderType,pickindex);
3710 				gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.mesh.GLfaces);
3711 				gl.drawElements(gl.TRIANGLES, this.mesh.GLfaces.numItems, gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
3712 			}
3713 
3714 			this.matrix=matrix;
3715 			this.caches=caches;
3716 		}
3717 	}
3718 }
3719 
3720 
3721 
3722 /**
3723 * @class Creates a new mesh to associate with a mesh
3724 * @see GLGE.Object
3725 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3726 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3727 * @augments GLGE.Events
3728 */
3729 GLGE.Mesh=function(uid){
3730 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3731 	this.GLbuffers=[];
3732 	this.buffers=[];
3733 	this.UV=[];
3734 	this.boneWeights=[];
3735 	this.setBuffers=[];
3736 	this.faces={};
3737 }
3738 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Mesh);
3739 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Mesh);
3740 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.Mesh);
3741 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.gl=null;
3742 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.className="Mesh";
3743 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLbuffers=null;
3744 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.buffers=null;
3745 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setBuffers=null;
3746 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLfaces=null;
3747 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.faces=null;
3748 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.UV=null;
3749 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.joints=null;
3750 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.invBind=null;
3751 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.loaded=false;
3752 /**
3753  * @name GLGE.Mesh#shaderupdate
3754  * @event fired when the shader needs updating
3755  * @param {object} data
3756  */
3757 
3758 /**
3759 * Gets the bounding volume for the mesh
3760 * @returns {GLGE.BoundingVolume} 
3761 */
3762 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.getBoundingVolume=function(){
3763 	if(!this.boundingVolume){
3764 		var minX,maxX,minY,maxY,minZ,maxZ;
3765 		for(var i=0;i<this.buffers.length;i++){
3766 			if(this.buffers[i].name=="position") var positions=this.buffers[i].data;
3767 		}
3768 		for(var i=0;i<positions.length;i=i+3){
3769 			if(i==0){
3770 				minX=maxX=positions[i];
3771 				minY=maxY=positions[i+1];
3772 				minZ=maxZ=positions[i+2];
3773 			}else{
3774 				minX=Math.min(minX,positions[i]);
3775 				maxX=Math.max(maxX,positions[i]);
3776 				minY=Math.min(minY,positions[i+1]);
3777 				maxY=Math.max(maxY,positions[i+1]);
3778 				minZ=Math.min(minZ,positions[i+2]);
3779 				maxZ=Math.max(maxZ,positions[i+2]);
3780 			}
3781 		}
3782 		this.boundingVolume=new GLGE.BoundingVolume(minX,maxX,minY,maxY,minZ,maxZ);
3783 	}
3784 	return this.boundingVolume;
3785 }
3786 /**
3787 * Sets the joints
3788 * @param {string[]} jsArray set joint objects
3789 */
3790 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setJoints=function(jsArray){
3791 	this.joints=jsArray;
3792 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
3793 	return this;
3794 }
3795 /**
3796 * Sets the inverse bind matrix for each joint
3797 * @param {GLGE.Matrix[]} jsArray set joint names
3798 */
3799 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setInvBindMatrix=function(jsArray){
3800 	this.invBind=jsArray;
3801 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
3802 	return this;
3803 }
3804 /**
3805 * Sets the joint channels for each vertex 
3806 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of bones
3807 * @param {Number} num the number of chanels in this mesh
3808 */
3809 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setVertexJoints=function(jsArray,num){
3810 	if(num<4){
3811 		this.setBuffer("joints1",jsArray,num);
3812 	}else{
3813 		var jsArray1=[];
3814 		var jsArray2=[];
3815 		for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i++){
3816 			if(i%num<4){
3817 				jsArray1.push(jsArray[i]);
3818 			}else{
3819 				jsArray2.push(jsArray[i]);
3820 			}
3821 		}
3822 		this.setBuffer("joints1",jsArray1,4);
3823 		this.setBuffer("joints2",jsArray2,num%4);
3824 	}
3825 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
3826 	return this;
3827 }
3828 /**
3829 * Sets the joint weights on each vertex
3830 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of weights
3831 * @param {Number} num the number of chanels in this mesh
3832 */
3833 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setVertexWeights=function(jsArray,num){
3834 	//normalize the weights!
3835 	for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i=i+parseInt(num)){
3836 		var total=0;
3837 		for(var n=0;n<num;n++){
3838 			total+=parseFloat(jsArray[i+n]);
3839 		}
3840 		for(var n=0;n<num;n++){
3841 			jsArray[i+n]=jsArray[i+n]/total;
3842 		}
3843 	}
3844 
3845 	if(num<4){
3846 		this.setBuffer("weights1",jsArray,num);
3847 	}else{
3848 		var jsArray1=[];
3849 		var jsArray2=[];
3850 		for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i++){
3851 			if(i%num<4){
3852 				jsArray1.push(jsArray[i]);
3853 			}else{
3854 				jsArray2.push(jsArray[i]);
3855 			}
3856 		}
3857 		this.setBuffer("weights1",jsArray1,4);
3858 		this.setBuffer("weights2",jsArray2,num%4);
3859 	}
3860 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
3861 	return this;
3862 }
3863 /**
3864 * Set the UV coord for the first UV layer
3865 * @param {Number[]} jsArray the UV coords in a 1 dimentional array
3866 */
3867 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setUV=function(jsArray){
3868 	var idx=0;
3869 	for(var i=0; i<jsArray.length;i=i+2){
3870 		this.UV[idx]=jsArray[i];
3871 		this.UV[idx+1]=jsArray[i+1];
3872 		if(!this.UV[idx+2]) this.UV[idx+2]=0;
3873 		if(!this.UV[idx+3]) this.UV[idx+3]=0;
3874 		idx=idx+4;
3875 	}
3876 	this.setBuffer("UV",this.UV,4);
3877 	return this;
3878 }
3879 /**
3880 * Set the UV coord for the second UV layer
3881 * @param {Number[]} jsArray the UV coords in a 1 dimentional array
3882 */
3883 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setUV2=function(jsArray){
3884 	var idx=0;
3885 	for(var i=0; i<jsArray.length;i=i+2){
3886 		if(!this.UV[idx]) this.UV[idx]=0;
3887 		if(!this.UV[idx+1]) this.UV[idx+1]=0;
3888 		this.UV[idx+2]=jsArray[i];
3889 		this.UV[idx+3]=jsArray[i+1];
3890 		idx=idx+4;
3891 	}
3892 	this.setBuffer("UV",this.UV,4);
3893 	return this;
3894 }
3895 /**
3896 * Sets the positions of the verticies
3897 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of positions
3898 */
3899 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setPositions=function(jsArray){
3900 	this.positions=jsArray;
3901 	this.setBuffer("position",jsArray,3);
3902 	return this;
3903 }
3904 /**
3905 * Sets the normals of the verticies
3906 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of normals
3907 */
3908 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setNormals=function(jsArray){
3909 	this.normals=jsArray;
3910 	this.setBuffer("normal",jsArray,3);
3911 	return this;
3912 }
3913 /**
3914 * Sets a buffer for the
3915 * @param {String} boneName The name of the bone
3916 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of weights
3917 * @private
3918 */
3919 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setBuffer=function(bufferName,jsArray,size){
3920 	//make sure all jsarray items are floats
3921 	for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i++) jsArray[i]=parseFloat(jsArray[i]);
3922 	var buffer;
3923 	for(var i=0;i<this.buffers.length;i++){
3924 		if(this.buffers[i].name==bufferName) buffer=i;
3925 	}
3926 	if(!buffer){
3927 		this.buffers.push({name:bufferName,data:jsArray,size:size,GL:false});
3928 	}
3929         else 
3930 	{
3931 		this.buffers[buffer]={name:bufferName,data:jsArray,size:size,GL:false};
3932 	}
3933 	return this;
3934 }
3935 /**
3936 * Sets the faces for this mesh
3937 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of normals
3938 */
3939 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setFaces=function(jsArray){
3940 	this.faces={data:jsArray,GL:false};	
3941 	//if at this point calculate normals if we haven't got them yet
3942 	if(!this.normals) this.calcNormals();
3943 	
3944 	//add a tangent buffer
3945 	for(var i=0;i<this.buffers.length;i++){
3946 		if(this.buffers[i].name=="position") var position=this.buffers[i].data;
3947 		if(this.buffers[i].name=="UV") var uv=this.buffers[i].data;
3948 		if(this.buffers[i].name=="normal") var normal=this.buffers[i].data;
3949 	}
3950 	
3951 
3952 	if(position && uv){
3953 		var tangentArray=[];
3954 		var data={};
3955 		var ref;
3956 		for(var i=0;i<this.faces.data.length;i=i+3){
3957 			var p1=[position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+1],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+2]];
3958 			var p2=[position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+1],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+2]];
3959 			var p3=[position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+1],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+2]];
3960 			
3961 			var n1=[normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+1],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+2]];
3962 			var n2=[normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+1],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+2]];
3963 			var n3=[normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+1],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+2]];
3964 			
3965 			var p21=[p2[0]-p1[0],p2[1]-p1[1],p2[2]-p1[2]];
3966 			var p31=[p3[0]-p1[0],p3[1]-p1[1],p3[2]-p1[2]];
3967 			var uv21=[uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*4]-uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*4],uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*4+1]-uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*4+1]];
3968 			var uv31=[uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*4]-uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*4],uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*4+1]-uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*4+1]];
3969 			
3970 
3971    
3972 			var tangent=GLGE.toUnitVec3([p21[0]*uv31[1]-p31[0]*uv21[01],
3973 								p21[1]*uv31[1]-p31[1]*uv21[1],
3974 								p21[2]*uv31[1]-p31[2]*uv21[1]]);		
3975 								
3976 			var cp = uv21[1] * uv31[0] - uv21[0] * uv31[1];
3977 			if ( cp != 0.0 ) tangent=GLGE.toUnitVec3(GLGE.scaleVec3(tangent,1/cp));
3978 
3979 			if(data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")]){
3980 				tang=data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")];
3981 				tang.vec=GLGE.scaleVec3(GLGE.addVec3(GLGE.scaleVec3(tang.vec,tang.weight),tangent),1/(tang.weight));
3982 				tang.weight++;
3983 			}else{
3984 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")]={vec:tangent,weight:1};
3985 			}
3986 			if(data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")]){
3987 				tang=data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")];
3988 				tang.vec=GLGE.scaleVec3(GLGE.addVec3(GLGE.scaleVec3(tang.vec,tang.weight),tangent),1/(tang.weight+1));
3989 				tang.weight++;
3990 			}else{
3991 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")]={vec:tangent,weight:1};
3992 			}
3993 			if(data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")]){
3994 				tang=data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")];
3995 				tang.vec=GLGE.scaleVec3(GLGE.addVec3(GLGE.scaleVec3(tang.vec,tang.weight),tangent),1/(tang.weight+1));
3996 				tang.weight++;
3997 			}else{
3998 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")]={vec:tangent,weight:1};
3999 			}
4000 		}
4001 		for(var i=0;i<position.length/3;i++){
4002 			var p1=[position[i*3],position[i*3+1],position[i*3+2]];
4003 			var n1=[normal[i*3],normal[i*3+1],normal[i*3+2]];
4004 			t=data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")].vec;
4005 			if(t){
4006 				tangentArray[i*3]=t[0];
4007 				tangentArray[i*3+1]=t[1];
4008 				tangentArray[i*3+2]=t[2];
4009 			}
4010 		}
4011 		this.setBuffer("tangent",tangentArray,3);
4012 	}
4013 	this.loaded=true;
4014 	return this;
4015 }
4016 /**
4017 * Sets the faces for this mesh
4018 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of normals
4019 * @private
4020 */
4021 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLSetFaceBuffer=function(gl){
4022 	if(!this.GLfaces) this.GLfaces = gl.createBuffer();
4023 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLfaces);
4024 	gl.bufferData(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, new Uint16Array(this.faces.data), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
4025 	this.GLfaces.itemSize = 1;
4026 	this.GLfaces.numItems = this.faces.data.length;
4027 }
4028 /**
4029 * Sets up a GL Buffer
4030 * @param {WebGLContext} gl The context being drawn on
4031 * @param {String} bufferName The name of the buffer to create
4032 * @param {Number[]}  jsArray The data to add to the buffer
4033 * @param {Number}  size Size of a single element within the array
4034 * @private
4035 */
4036 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLSetBuffer=function(gl,bufferName,jsArray,size){
4037 	if(!this.GLbuffers[bufferName]) this.GLbuffers[bufferName] = gl.createBuffer();
4038 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLbuffers[bufferName]);
4039 	gl.bufferData(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array(jsArray), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
4040 	this.GLbuffers[bufferName].itemSize = size;
4041 	this.GLbuffers[bufferName].numItems = jsArray.length/size;
4042 };
4043 /**
4044 * Calculates the normals for this mesh
4045 * @private
4046 */
4047 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.calcNormals=function(){
4048 	var normals=[];
4049 	var positions=this.positions;
4050 	var faces=this.faces.data;
4051 	for(var i=0;i<faces.length;i=i+3){
4052 		var v1=[positions[faces[i]*3],positions[faces[i]*3+1],positions[faces[i]*3+2]];
4053 		var v2=[positions[faces[i+1]*3],positions[faces[i+1]*3+1],positions[faces[i+1]*3+2]];
4054 		var v3=[positions[faces[i+2]*3],positions[faces[i+2]*3+1],positions[faces[i+2]*3+2]];
4055 		var vec1=GLGE.subVec3(v2,v1);
4056 		var vec2=GLGE.subVec3(v3,v1);
4057 		var norm=GLGE.toUnitVec3(GLGE.crossVec3(vec1,vec2));
4058 		if(normals[faces[i]]==undefined) normals[faces[i]]=[];
4059 		normals[faces[i]].push(norm);
4060 		if(normals[faces[i+1]]==undefined) normals[faces[i+1]]=[];
4061 		normals[faces[i+1]].push(norm);
4062 		if(normals[faces[i+2]]==undefined) normals[faces[i+2]]=[];
4063 		normals[faces[i+2]].push(norm);
4064 	}
4065 	var norms=[];
4066 	for(i=0;i<normals.length;i++){
4067 		var x=0,y=0,z=0;
4068 		if(normals[i]!=undefined){
4069 			for(var j=0;j<normals[i].length;j++){
4070 				x+=normals[i][j][0];
4071 				y+=normals[i][j][1];
4072 				z+=normals[i][j][2];
4073 			}
4074 			x/=normals[i].length;
4075 			y/=normals[i].length;
4076 			z/=normals[i].length;
4077 			norms[i*3]=x;
4078 			norms[i*3+1]=y;
4079 			norms[i*3+2]=z;
4080 		}
4081 	}
4082 	this.setNormals(norms);
4083 }
4084 /**
4085 * Sets the Attributes for this mesh
4086 * @param {WebGLContext} gl The context being drawn on
4087 * @private
4088 */
4089 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLAttributes=function(gl,shaderProgram){
4090 	//if at this point we have no normals set then calculate them
4091 	if(!this.normals) this.calcNormals();
4092 
4093 	//disable all the attribute initially arrays - do I really need this?
4094 	for(var i=0; i<8; i++) gl.disableVertexAttribArray(i);
4095 	//check if the faces have been updated
4096 	if(!this.faces.GL){
4097 		this.GLSetFaceBuffer(gl);
4098 		this.faces.GL=true;
4099 	}
4100 	//loop though the buffers
4101 	for(i=0; i<this.buffers.length;i++){
4102 		if(!this.buffers[i].GL){
4103 			this.GLSetBuffer(gl,this.buffers[i].name,this.buffers[i].data,this.buffers[i].size);
4104 			this.buffers[i].GL=true;
4105 		}
4106 		attribslot=GLGE.getAttribLocation(gl,shaderProgram, this.buffers[i].name);
4107 		if(attribslot>-1){
4108 			gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLbuffers[this.buffers[i].name]);
4109 			gl.enableVertexAttribArray(attribslot);
4110 			gl.vertexAttribPointer(attribslot, this.GLbuffers[this.buffers[i].name].itemSize, gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
4111 		}
4112 	}
4113 }
4114 
4115 
4116 
4117 /**
4118 * @class Creates a new light source to be added to a scene
4119 * @property {Boolean} diffuse Dose this light source effect diffuse shading
4120 * @property {Boolean} specular Dose this light source effect specular shading
4121 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
4122 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
4123 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
4124 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
4125 */
4126 GLGE.Light=function(uid){
4127 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
4128 	this.color={r:1,g:1,b:1};
4129 }
4130 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Light);
4131 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Light);
4132 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Light);
4133 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Light);
4134 GLGE.Light.prototype.className="Light";
4135 /**
4136 * @constant 
4137 * @description Enumeration for an point light source
4138 */
4139 GLGE.L_POINT=1;
4140 /**
4141 * @constant 
4142 * @description Enumeration for an directional light source
4143 */
4144 GLGE.L_DIR=2;
4145 /**
4146 * @constant 
4147 * @description Enumeration for an spot light source
4148 */
4149 GLGE.L_SPOT=3;
4150 
4151 GLGE.Light.prototype.constantAttenuation=1;
4152 GLGE.Light.prototype.linearAttenuation=0.002;
4153 GLGE.Light.prototype.quadraticAttenuation=0.0008;
4154 GLGE.Light.prototype.spotCosCutOff=0.95;
4155 GLGE.Light.prototype.spotPMatrix=null;
4156 GLGE.Light.prototype.spotExponent=10;
4157 GLGE.Light.prototype.color=null; 
4158 GLGE.Light.prototype.diffuse=true; 
4159 GLGE.Light.prototype.specular=true; 
4160 GLGE.Light.prototype.samples=0; 
4161 GLGE.Light.prototype.softness=0.01; 
4162 GLGE.Light.prototype.type=GLGE.L_POINT;
4163 GLGE.Light.prototype.frameBuffer=null;
4164 GLGE.Light.prototype.renderBuffer=null;
4165 GLGE.Light.prototype.texture=null;
4166 GLGE.Light.prototype.bufferHeight=256;
4167 GLGE.Light.prototype.bufferWidth=256;
4168 GLGE.Light.prototype.shadowBias=2.0;
4169 GLGE.Light.prototype.castShadows=false;
4170 /**
4171 * Gets the spot lights projection matrix
4172 * @returns the lights spot projection matrix
4173 * @private
4174 */
4175 GLGE.Light.prototype.getPMatrix=function(){
4176 	if(!this.spotPMatrix){
4177 		var far;
4178 		if(this.scene && this.scene.camera) far=this.scene.camera.far;
4179 			else far=1000;
4180 		this.spotPMatrix=GLGE.makePerspective(Math.acos(this.spotCosCutOff)/3.14159*360, 1.0, 0.1, far);
4181 	}
4182 	return this.spotPMatrix;
4183 }
4184 /**
4185 * Sets the shadow casting flag
4186 * @param {number} value should cast shadows?
4187 */
4188 GLGE.Light.prototype.setCastShadows=function(value){
4189 	this.castShadows=value;
4190 	return this;
4191 }
4192 /**
4193 * Gets the shadow casting flag
4194 * @returns {number} true if casts shadows
4195 */
4196 GLGE.Light.prototype.getCastShadows=function(){
4197 	return this.castShadows;
4198 	return this;
4199 }
4200 /**
4201 * Sets the shadow bias
4202 * @param {number} value The shadow bias
4203 */
4204 GLGE.Light.prototype.setShadowBias=function(value){
4205 	this.shadowBias=value;
4206 	return this;
4207 }
4208 /**
4209 * Gets the shadow bias
4210 * @returns {number} The shadow buffer bias
4211 */
4212 GLGE.Light.prototype.getShadowBias=function(){
4213 	return this.shadowBias;
4214 }
4215 
4216 /**
4217 * Sets the number of samples for this shadow
4218 * @param {number} value The number of samples to perform
4219 */
4220 GLGE.Light.prototype.setShadowSamples=function(value){
4221 	this.samples=value;
4222 	return this;
4223 }
4224 /**
4225 * Gets the number of samples for this shadow
4226 * @returns {number} The number of samples
4227 */
4228 GLGE.Light.prototype.getShadowSamples=function(){
4229 	return this.samples;
4230 }
4231 /**
4232 * Sets the shadow softness
4233 * @param {number} value The number of samples to perform
4234 */
4235 GLGE.Light.prototype.setShadowSoftness=function(value){
4236 	this.softness=value;
4237 	return this;
4238 }
4239 /**
4240 * Gets the shadow softness
4241 * @returns {number} The softness of the shadows
4242 */
4243 GLGE.Light.prototype.getShadowSamples=function(){
4244 	return this.softness;
4245 }
4246 /**
4247 * Sets the shadow buffer width
4248 * @param {number} value The shadow buffer width
4249 */
4250 GLGE.Light.prototype.setBufferWidth=function(value){
4251 	this.bufferWidth=value;
4252 	return this;
4253 }
4254 /**
4255 * Gets the shadow buffer width
4256 * @returns {number} The shadow buffer width
4257 */
4258 GLGE.Light.prototype.getBufferHeight=function(){
4259 	return this.bufferHeight;
4260 }
4261 /**
4262 * Sets the shadow buffer width
4263 * @param {number} value The shadow buffer width
4264 */
4265 GLGE.Light.prototype.setBufferHeight=function(value){
4266 	this.bufferHeight=value;
4267 	return this;
4268 }
4269 /**
4270 * Gets the shadow buffer width
4271 * @returns {number} The shadow buffer width
4272 */
4273 GLGE.Light.prototype.getBufferWidth=function(){
4274 	return this.bufferWidth;
4275 }
4276 /**
4277 * Sets the spot light cut off
4278 * @param {number} value The cos of the angle to limit
4279 */
4280 GLGE.Light.prototype.setSpotCosCutOff=function(value){
4281 	this.spotPMatrix=null;
4282 	this.spotCosCutOff=value;
4283 	return this;
4284 }
4285 /**
4286 * Gets the spot light cut off
4287 * @returns {number} The cos of the limiting angle 
4288 */
4289 GLGE.Light.prototype.getSpotCosCutOff=function(){
4290 	return this.spotCosCutOff;
4291 }
4292 /**
4293 * Sets the spot light exponent
4294 * @param {number} value The spot lights exponent
4295 */
4296 GLGE.Light.prototype.setSpotExponent=function(value){
4297 	this.spotExponent=value;
4298 	return this;
4299 }
4300 /**
4301 * Gets the spot light exponent
4302 * @returns {number} The exponent of the spot light
4303 */
4304 GLGE.Light.prototype.getSpotExponent=function(){
4305 	return this.spotExponent;
4306 }
4307 /**
4308 * Sets the light sources Attenuation
4309 * @returns {Object} The components of the light sources attenuation
4310 */
4311 GLGE.Light.prototype.getAttenuation=function(constant,linear,quadratic){
4312 	var attenuation={};
4313 	attenuation.constant=this.constantAttenuation;
4314 	attenuation.linear=this.linearAttenuation;
4315 	attenuation.quadratic=this.quadraticAttenuation;
4316 	return attenuation;
4317 }
4318 /**
4319 * Sets the light sources Attenuation
4320 * @param {Number} constant The constant part of the attenuation
4321 * @param {Number} linear The linear part of the attenuation
4322 * @param {Number} quadratic The quadratic part of the attenuation
4323 */
4324 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuation=function(constant,linear,quadratic){
4325 	this.constantAttenuation=constant;
4326 	this.linearAttenuation=linear;
4327 	this.quadraticAttenuation=quadratic;
4328 	return this;
4329 }
4330 /**
4331 * Sets the light sources constant attenuation
4332 * @param {Number} value The constant part of the attenuation
4333 */
4334 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuationConstant=function(value){
4335 	this.constantAttenuation=value;
4336 	return this;
4337 }
4338 /**
4339 * Sets the light sources linear attenuation
4340 * @param {Number} value The linear part of the attenuation
4341 */
4342 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuationLinear=function(value){
4343 	this.linearAttenuation=value;
4344 	return this;
4345 }
4346 /**
4347 * Sets the light sources quadratic attenuation
4348 * @param {Number} value The quadratic part of the attenuation
4349 */
4350 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuationQuadratic=function(value){
4351 	this.quadraticAttenuation=value;
4352 	return this;
4353 }
4354 
4355 /**
4356 * Sets the color of the light source
4357 * @param {string} color The color of the light
4358 */
4359 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColor=function(color){
4360 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
4361 	this.color={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
4362 	return this;
4363 }
4364 /**
4365 * Sets the red color of the light source
4366 * @param {Number} value The new red level 0-1
4367 */
4368 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColorR=function(value){
4369 	this.color.r=value;
4370 	return this;
4371 }
4372 /**
4373 * Sets the green color of the light source
4374 * @param {Number} value The new green level 0-1
4375 */
4376 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColorG=function(value){
4377 	this.color.g=value;
4378 	return this;
4379 }
4380 /**
4381 * Sets the blue color of the light source
4382 * @param {Number} value The new blue level 0-1
4383 */
4384 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColorB=function(value){
4385 	this.color.b=value;
4386 	return this;
4387 }
4388 /**
4389 * Gets the current color of the light source
4390 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current position
4391 */
4392 GLGE.Light.prototype.getColor=function(){
4393 	return this.color;
4394 }
4395 /**
4396 * Gets the type of the light
4397 * @return {Number} The type of the light source eg GLGE.L_POINT
4398 */
4399 GLGE.Light.prototype.getType=function(){
4400 	return this.type;
4401 }
4402 /**
4403 * Sets the type of the light
4404 * @param {Number} type The type of the light source eg GLGE.L_POINT
4405 */
4406 GLGE.Light.prototype.setType=function(type){
4407 	this.type=type;
4408 	return this;
4409 }
4410 /**
4411 * init for the rendering
4412 * @private
4413 */
4414 GLGE.Light.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){	
4415 	this.gl=gl;
4416 	if(this.type==GLGE.L_SPOT && !this.texture){
4417 		this.createSpotBuffer(gl);
4418 	}
4419 }
4420 /**
4421 * Sets up the WebGL needed to render the depth map for this light source. Only used for spot lights which produce shadows
4422 * @private
4423 */
4424 GLGE.Light.prototype.createSpotBuffer=function(gl){
4425     this.frameBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
4426     this.renderBuffer = gl.createRenderbuffer();
4427     this.texture = gl.createTexture();
4428     gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture);
4429 
4430     try {
4431         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, null);
4432     } catch (e) {
4433         var tex = new Uint8Array(this.bufferWidth * this.bufferHeight * 4);
4434         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
4435     }
4436     
4437     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.frameBuffer);
4438     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
4439     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT16, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight);
4440     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
4441     
4442     gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture, 0);
4443     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
4444     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
4445 }
4446 
4447 /**
4448 * @constant 
4449 * @description Enumeration for a perspective camera
4450 */
4451 GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE=1;
4452 /**
4453 * @constant 
4454 * @description Enumeration for a orthographic camera
4455 */
4456 GLGE.C_ORTHO=2;
4457 
4458 /**
4459 * @class Creates a new camera object
4460 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
4461 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
4462 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
4463 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
4464 */
4465 GLGE.Camera=function(uid){
4466 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
4467 };
4468 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Camera);
4469 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Camera);
4470 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Camera);
4471 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Camera);
4472 GLGE.Camera.prototype.className="Camera";
4473 GLGE.Camera.prototype.fovy=35;
4474 GLGE.Camera.prototype.aspect=1.0;
4475 GLGE.Camera.prototype.near=0.1;
4476 GLGE.Camera.prototype.far=1000.0;
4477 GLGE.Camera.prototype.orthoscale=5;
4478 GLGE.Camera.prototype.type=GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE;
4479 GLGE.Camera.prototype.pMatrix=null;
4480 
4481 /**
4482 * Method gets the orthographic scale for the camers
4483 * @return {Matrix} Returns the orthographic scale
4484 */
4485 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getOrthoScale=function(){
4486 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
4487 		return this.orthoscale
4488 	}else{
4489 		GLGE.error("You may only get a scale for a orthographic camera");
4490 		return 1;
4491 	}
4492 };
4493 /**
4494 * Method sets the orthographic scale for the camers
4495 * @param {number} scale The new orthographic scale
4496 */
4497 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setOrthoScale=function(scale){
4498 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
4499 		this.orthoscale=scale;
4500 		this.pMatrix=null;
4501 	}
4502 	else
4503 	{
4504 		GLGE.error("You may only set a scale for a orthographic camera");
4505 	}
4506 	return this;
4507 };
4508 
4509 /**
4510 * Method gets the far drawing distance
4511 * @return {Matrix} Returns the cameras far draw distance
4512 */
4513 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getFar=function(){
4514 	return this.far;
4515 };
4516 /**
4517 * Method sets the far draw distance of the camera
4518 * @param {number} distance The far draw distance
4519 */
4520 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setFar=function(distance){
4521 	this.far=distance;
4522 	return this;
4523 };
4524 
4525 /**
4526 * Method gets the near drawing distance
4527 * @return {Matrix} Returns the cameras near draw distance
4528 */
4529 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getNear=function(){
4530 	return this.near;
4531 };
4532 /**
4533 * Method sets the near draw distance of the camera
4534 * @param {number} distance The near draw distance
4535 */
4536 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setNear=function(distance){
4537 	this.near=distance;
4538 	return this;
4539 };
4540 
4541 /**
4542 * Method gets the current camera type
4543 * @return {Matrix} Returns the camera type
4544 */
4545 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getType=function(){
4546 	return this.type
4547 };
4548 /**
4549 * Method sets the type of camera GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE or GLGE.C_ORTHO
4550 * @param {number} type The type of this camera
4551 */
4552 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setType=function(type){
4553 	if(type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE || type==GLGE.C_ORTHO){
4554 		this.type=type;
4555 		this.pMatrix=null;
4556 	}else{
4557 		GLGE.error("unsuported camera type");
4558 	}
4559 	return this;
4560 };
4561 
4562 /**
4563 * Method gets the current yfov if the camera type is GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE
4564 * @return {Matrix} Returns the yfov
4565 */
4566 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getFovY=function(){
4567 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE) {
4568 		return this.fovy
4569 	}else{
4570 		GLGE.error("You may only get a yfov for a perspective camera");
4571 		return 1;
4572 	}
4573 };
4574 /**
4575 * Method sets the yfov of the camera
4576 * @param {number} yfov The new yfov of the camera
4577 */
4578 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setFovY=function(fovy){
4579 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE) {
4580 		this.fovy=fovy;
4581 		this.ymax=null;
4582 		this.pMatrix=null;
4583 	}
4584 	else
4585 	{
4586 		GLGE.error("You may only set a yfov for a perspective camera");
4587 	}
4588 	return this;
4589 };
4590 
4591 /**
4592 * Method gets the current aspect if the camera type is GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE
4593 * @return {Matrix} Returns the yfov
4594 */
4595 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getAspect=function(){
4596 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE || this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
4597 		return this.aspect
4598 	}
4599 	else
4600 	{
4601 		GLGE.error("You may only set a aspect for a perspective or orthographic camera");
4602 		return 1;
4603 	}
4604 };
4605 /**
4606 * Method sets the aspect of the camera
4607 * @param {number} aspect The new projection matrix
4608 */
4609 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setAspect=function(aspect){
4610 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE || this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
4611 		this.aspect=aspect;
4612 		this.pMatrix=null;
4613 	}
4614 	else
4615 	{
4616 		GLGE.error("You may only set a aspect for a perspective or orthographic camera");
4617 	}
4618 	return this;
4619 };
4620 
4621 
4622 /**
4623 * Method gets the current projection matrix of this camera
4624 * @return {Matrix} Returns the camera projection matrix
4625 */
4626 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getProjectionMatrix=function(){
4627 	if(!this.pMatrix){
4628 		switch(this.type){
4629 			case GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE:
4630 				this.pMatrix=GLGE.makePerspective(this.fovy, this.aspect, this.near, this.far);
4631 				break;
4632 			case GLGE.C_ORTHO:
4633 				this.pMatrix=GLGE.makeOrtho(-this.orthoscale*this.aspect,this.orthoscale*this.aspect,-this.orthoscale,this.orthoscale, this.near, this.far);
4634 				break;
4635 		}
4636 	}
4637 	return this.pMatrix;
4638 };
4639 /**
4640 * Method generates the projection matrix based on the 
4641 * camera paramaters
4642 * @param {Matrix} projection The new projection matrix
4643 */
4644 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setProjectionMatrix=function(projection){
4645 	this.pMatrix=projection;
4646 	return this;
4647 };
4648 /**
4649 * Method generates the cameras view matrix
