4650 * @return Returns the view matrix based on this camera
4651 * @type Matrix
4652 */
4653 GLGE.Camera.prototype.updateMatrix=function(){
4654 	var position=this.getPosition();
4655 	var vMatrix=GLGE.translateMatrix(position.x,position.y,position.z);
4656 	vMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(vMatrix,this.getRotMatrix());
4657 	if(this.parent) vMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(this.parent.getModelMatrix(),vMatrix);
4658 	this.matrix=GLGE.inverseMat4(vMatrix);
4659 };
4660 /**
4661 * Method generates the cameras view matrix
4662 * @return Returns the view matrix based on this camera
4663 * @type Matrix
4664 */
4665 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getViewMatrix=function(){
4666 	if(!this.matrix || !this.rotmatrix) this.updateMatrix();
4667 	return this.matrix;
4668 };
4669 
4670 
4671 
4672 /**
4673 * @constant 
4674 * @description Enumeration for no fog
4675 */
4676 GLGE.FOG_NONE=1;
4677 /**
4678 * @constant 
4679 * @description Enumeration for linear fall off fog
4680 */
4681 GLGE.FOG_LINEAR=2;
4682 /**
4683 * @constant 
4684 * @description Enumeration for exponential fall off fog
4685 */
4686 GLGE.FOG_QUADRATIC=3;
4687 
4688 /**
4689 * @class Scene class containing the camera, lights and objects
4690 * @augments GLGE.Group
4691 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
4692 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
4693 */
4694 GLGE.Scene=function(uid){
4695 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
4696 	this.children=[];
4697 	this.camera=new GLGE.Camera();
4698 	this.backgroundColor={r:1,g:1,b:1,a:1};
4699 	this.ambientColor={r:0,g:0,b:0};
4700 	this.fogColor={r:0.5,g:0.5,b:0.5};
4701 	this.passes=[];
4702 }
4703 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Group,GLGE.Scene);
4704 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Scene);
4705 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Scene);
4706 GLGE.Scene.prototype.camera=null;
4707 GLGE.Scene.prototype.className="Scene";
4708 GLGE.Scene.prototype.renderer=null;
4709 GLGE.Scene.prototype.backgroundColor=null;
4710 GLGE.Scene.prototype.filter=null;
4711 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogColor=null;
4712 GLGE.Scene.prototype.ambientColor=null;
4713 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogNear=10;
4714 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogFar=80;
4715 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogType=GLGE.FOG_NONE;
4716 GLGE.Scene.prototype.passes=null;
4717 
4718 /**
4719 * Gets the fog falloff type
4720 * @returns {number} the far falloff type
4721 */
4722 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogType=function(){	
4723 	return this.fogType;
4724 }
4725 /**
4726 * Sets the scenes fog falloff type
4727 * @param {number} type The fog falloff type FOG_NONE,FOG_LINEAR,FOG_QUADRATIC
4728 */
4729 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogType=function(type){	
4730 	this.fogType=type;
4731 	return this;
4732 }
4733 
4734 /**
4735 * Gets the far fog distance
4736 * @returns {number} the far distance of the fog
4737 */
4738 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogFar=function(){	
4739 	return this.fogFar;
4740 }
4741 /**
4742 * Sets the scenes fog far distance
4743 * @param {number} dist The fog far distance
4744 */
4745 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogFar=function(dist){	
4746 	this.fogFar=dist;
4747 	return this;
4748 }
4749 
4750 /**
4751 * Gets the near fog distance
4752 * @returns {number} the near distance of the fog
4753 */
4754 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogNear=function(){	
4755 	return this.fogNear;
4756 }
4757 /**
4758 * Sets the scenes fog near distance
4759 * @param {number} dist The fog near distance
4760 */
4761 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogNear=function(dist){	
4762 	this.fogNear=dist;
4763 	return this;

4765 
4766 /**
4767 * Gets the fog color
4768 * @returns {object} An assoiative array r,g,b
4769 */
4770 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogColor=function(){	
4771 	return this.fogColor;
4772 }
4773 /**
4774 * Sets the scenes fog color
4775 * @param {string} color The fog color
4776 */
4777 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogColor=function(color){	
4778 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
4779 	this.fogColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
4780 	return this;
4781 }
4782 
4783 /**
4784 * Gets the scenes background color
4785 * @returns {object} An assoiative array r,g,b
4786 */
4787 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getBackgroundColor=function(){	
4788 	return this.backgroundColor;
4789 }
4790 /**
4791 * Sets the scenes background color
4792 * @param {string} color The backgorund color
4793 */
4794 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setBackgroundColor=function(color){	
4795 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
4796 	this.backgroundColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b,a:color.a};
4797 	return this;
4798 }
4799 /**
4800 * Gets the scenes ambient light
4801 * @returns {object} An assoiative array r,g,b
4802 */
4803 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getAmbientColor=function(){	
4804 	return this.ambientColor;
4805 }
4806 
4807 /**
4808 * Sets the scenes ambient light
4809 * @param {string} color The ambient light color
4810 */
4811 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColor=function(color){	
4812 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
4813 	this.ambientColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
4814 	if(this.renderer){
4815 		this.renderer.gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, 1.0);
4816 	}
4817 	return this;
4818 }
4819 /**
4820 * Sets the scenes ambient light
4821 * @param {number} value the red componenent of the ambient light 0-1
4822 */
4823 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColorR=function(value){	
4824 	this.ambientColor.r=value;
4825 	return this;
4826 }
4827 /**
4828 * Sets the scenes ambient light
4829 * @param {number} value the green componenent of the ambient light 0-1
4830 */
4831 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColorG=function(value){	
4832 	this.ambientColor.g=value;
4833 	return this;
4834 }
4835 /**
4836 * Sets the scenes ambient light
4837 * @param {number} value the blue componenent of the ambient light 0-1
4838 */
4839 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColorB=function(value){	
4840 	this.ambientColor.b=value;
4841 	return this;
4842 }
4843 
4844 /**
4845 * Sets the active camera for this scene
4846 * @property {GLGE.Camera} object The object to be added
4847 */
4848 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setCamera=function(camera){	
4849 	if(typeof camera=="string")  camera=GLGE.Assets.get(camera);
4850 	this.camera=camera;
4851 	return this;
4852 }
4853 /**
4854 * Gets the scenes active camera
4855 * @returns {GLGE.Camera} The current camera
4856 */
4857 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getCamera=function(){	
4858 	return this.camera;
4859 }
4860 /**
4861 * used to initialize all the WebGL buffers etc need for this scene
4862 * @private
4863 */
4864 GLGE.Scene.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
4865 	this.gl=gl;
4866 	gl.lights=this.getLights();
4867 	//sets the camera aspect to same aspect as the canvas
4868 	this.camera.setAspect(this.renderer.canvas.width/this.renderer.canvas.height);
4869 
4870 	//this.createPickBuffer(gl);
4871 	this.renderer.gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, 1.0);
4872 	
4873 	for(var i=0;i<this.children;i++){
4874 		if(this.children[i].GLInit) children[i].GLInit(gl);
4875 	}
4876 }
4877 /**
4878 * used to clean up all the WebGL buffers etc need for this scene
4879 * @private
4880 */
4881 GLGE.Scene.prototype.GLDestroy=function(gl){
4882 }
4883 /**
4884 * sort function
4885 */
4886 GLGE.Scene.sortFunc=function(a,b){
4887 	return a.zdepth-b.zdepth;
4888 }
4889 /**
4890 * z sorts the objects
4891 * @private
4892 */
4893 GLGE.Scene.prototype.zSort=function(gl,objects){
4894 	var cameraMatrix=gl.scene.camera.getViewMatrix();
4895 	var transMatrix;
4896 	for(var i=0;i<objects.length;i++){
4897 		transMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,objects[i].getModelMatrix());
4898 		objects[i].zdepth=transMatrix[11];
4899 	}
4900 	objects.sort(GLGE.Scene.sortFunc);
4901 	return objects;
4902 }
4903 /**
4904 * sets the 2d filter to apply
4905 * @param {GLGE.Filter2d} filter the filter to apply when rendering the scene
4906 */
4907 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFilter2d=function(value){
4908 	this.filter=value;
4909 	return this;
4910 }
4911 /**
4912 * gets the 2d filter being applied apply
4913 * @returns {GLGE.Filter2d}
4914 */
4915 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFilter2d=function(filter){
4916 	return this.filter;
4917 }
4918 /**
4919 * gets the scenes frame buffer
4920 * @private
4921 */
4922 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFrameBuffer=function(gl){
4923 	if(this.filter) return this.filter.getFrameBuffer(gl);
4924 	return null;
4925 }
4926 /**
4927 * culls objects from the scene
4928 * @private
4929 */
4930 GLGE.Scene.prototype.cull=function(renderobjects,camera,projection){
4931 	return renderobjects;
4932 }
4933 
4934 /**
4935 * renders the scene
4936 * @private
4937 */
4938 GLGE.Scene.prototype.render=function(gl){
4939 	//if look at is set then look
4940 	if(this.camera.lookAt) this.camera.Lookat(this.camera.lookAt);	
4941 	
4942 	this.animate();
4943 	
4944 	var lights=gl.lights;
4945 	gl.scene=this;
4946 	
4947 	gl.disable(gl.BLEND);
4948 	
4949 	this.framebuffer=this.getFrameBuffer(gl);
4950 	
4951 	var renderObjects=this.getObjects();
4952 	//shadow stuff
4953 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
4954 		if(lights[i].castShadows){
4955 			if(!lights[i].gl) lights[i].GLInit(gl);
4956 			gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, lights[i].frameBuffer);
4957 			
4958 
4959 			gl.viewport(0,0,lights[i].bufferWidth,lights[i].bufferHeight);
4960 			gl.clear(gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
4961 			var cameraMatrix=this.camera.matrix;
4962 			var cameraPMatrix=this.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
4963 			if(!lights[i].s_cache) lights[i].s_cache={};
4964 			if(lights[i].s_cache.pmatrix!=lights[i].getPMatrix() || lights[i].s_cache.mvmatrix!=lights[i].getModelMatrix()){
4965 				lights[i].s_cache.pmatrix=lights[i].getPMatrix();
4966 				lights[i].s_cache.mvmatrix=lights[i].getModelMatrix();
4967 				lights[i].s_cache.imvmatrix=GLGE.inverseMat4(lights[i].getModelMatrix());
4968 				lights[i].s_cache.smatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(lights[i].getPMatrix(),lights[i].s_cache.imvmatrix);
4969 			}
4970 			this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(lights[i].s_cache.pmatrix);
4971 			this.camera.matrix=lights[i].s_cache.imvmatrix;
4972 			//draw shadows
4973 			for(var n=0; n<renderObjects.length;n++){
4974 				renderObjects[n].GLRender(gl, GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW,n);
4975 			}
4976 			gl.flush();
4977 			this.camera.matrix=cameraMatrix;
4978 			this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(cameraPMatrix);
4979 			gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
4980 		}
4981 	}
4982 	if(this.camera.animation) this.camera.animate();
4983 	
4984 	//null render pass to findout what else needs rendering
4985 	this.getPasses(gl,renderObjects);	
4986 	
4987 	//first off render the passes
4988 	var cameraMatrix=this.camera.matrix;
4989 	var cameraPMatrix=this.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
4990 	this.allowPasses=false;
4991 	while(this.passes.length>0){
4992 		var pass=this.passes.pop();
4993 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, pass.frameBuffer);
4994 		this.camera.matrix=pass.cameraMatrix;
4995 		this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(pass.projectionMatrix);
4996 		this.renderPass(gl,renderObjects,pass.width,pass.height);
4997 	}
4998 	
4999 	this.camera.matrix=cameraMatrix;
5000 	this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(cameraPMatrix);
5001 	
5002 
5003 	gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.framebuffer);
5004 	this.renderPass(gl,renderObjects,this.renderer.canvas.width,this.renderer.canvas.height);	
5005 	
5006 	this.applyFilter(gl,renderObjects,null);
5007 	
5008 	this.allowPasses=true;
5009 
5010 }
5011 /**
5012 * gets the passes needed to render this scene
5013 * @private
5014 */
5015 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getPasses=function(gl,renderObjects){
5016 	for(var i=0; i<renderObjects.length;i++){
5017 		renderObjects[i].GLRender(gl,GLGE.RENDER_NULL);
5018 	}
5019 }
5020 
5021 /**
5022 * renders the scene
5023 * @private
5024 */
5025 GLGE.Scene.prototype.renderPass=function(gl,renderObjects,width,height,type){
5026 	if(!type) type=GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT;
5027 	
5028 	gl.clearDepth(1.0);
5029 	gl.depthFunc(gl.LEQUAL);
5030 	gl.viewport(0,0,width,height);
5031 	
5032 	gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, this.backgroundColor.a);
5033 	
5034 	gl.clear(gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT | gl.STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT);
5035 	var transObjects=[];
5036 	gl.disable(gl.BLEND);
5037 	for(var i=0; i<renderObjects.length;i++){
5038 		if(!renderObjects[i].zTrans) renderObjects[i].GLRender(gl,type);
5039 			else transObjects.push(renderObjects[i])
5040 	}
5041 
5042 	gl.enable(gl.BLEND);
5043 	transObjects=this.zSort(gl,transObjects);
5044 	for(var i=0; i<transObjects.length;i++){
5045 		transObjects[i].GLRender(gl, type);
5046 	}
5047 }
5048 
5049 GLGE.Scene.prototype.applyFilter=function(gl,renderObject,framebuffer){
5050 	if(this.filter && this.filter.renderDepth){	
5051 		gl.clearDepth(1.0);
5052 		gl.depthFunc(gl.LEQUAL);
5053 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.filter.getDepthBuffer(gl));
5054 		this.renderPass(gl,renderObject,this.filter.getDepthBufferWidth(), this.filter.getDepthBufferHeight(),GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW);	
5055 	}
5056 	
5057 	if(this.filter && this.filter.renderNormal){	
5058 		gl.clearDepth(1.0);
5059 		gl.depthFunc(gl.LEQUAL);
5060 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.filter.getNormalBuffer(gl));
5061 		this.renderPass(gl,renderObject,this.filter.getNormalBufferWidth(),this.filter.getNormalBufferHeight(),GLGE.RENDER_NORMAL);	
5062 	}
5063 	
5064 	if(this.filter) this.filter.GLRender(gl,framebuffer);
5065 }
5066 
5067 /**
5068 * Adds and additional render pass to the scene for RTT, reflections and refractions
5069 * @private
5070 */
5071 GLGE.Scene.prototype.addRenderPass=function(frameBuffer,cameraMatrix,projectionMatrix,width,height){
5072 	if(this.allowPasses)	this.passes.push({frameBuffer:frameBuffer, cameraMatrix:cameraMatrix, projectionMatrix:projectionMatrix, height:height, width:width});
5073 	return this;
5074 }
5075 /**
5076 * Sets up the WebGL needed create a picking frame and render buffer
5077 * @private
5078 */
5079 /*GLGE.Scene.prototype.createPickBuffer=function(gl){
5080     this.framePickBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
5081     this.renderPickBufferD = gl.createRenderbuffer();
5082     this.renderPickBufferC = gl.createRenderbuffer();
5083     //this.pickTexture = gl.createTexture();
5084     //gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.pickTexture);
5085 
5086     //TODO update when null is accepted
5087    /* try {
5088         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, 4, 1, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, null);
5089     } catch (e) {
5090         var tex = new Uint8Array(4*1*4);
5091         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, 4,1, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
5092     }
5093     
5094     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.framePickBuffer);
5095     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferD);
5096     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT16,4, 1);
5097     //gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.pickTexture, 0);
5098     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferD);
5099     
5100     
5101     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferC);
5102     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.RGBA,4, 1);
5103     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferC);
5104     
5105     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
5106     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
5107     gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
5108 }*/
5109 
5110 /**
5111 * ray query from origin in the given direction
5112 * @param origin the source of the ray
5113 * @param direction the direction of the ray
5114 */
5115 GLGE.Scene.prototype.ray=function(origin,direction){
5116 
5117 		var gl=this.renderer.gl;
5118 		var origmatrix=this.camera.matrix;	
5119 		var origpmatrix=this.camera.pMatrix;
5120 		
5121 		this.camera.matrix=GLGE.inverseMat4(GLGE.Mat4([direction[2], direction[1], direction[0], origin[0],
5122 									direction[0], direction[2], direction[1], origin[1],
5123 									direction[1], direction[0], direction[2], origin[2],
5124 									0, 0, 0, 1]));
5125 
5126 		if(!this.pickPMatrix)	this.pickPMatrix=GLGE.makeOrtho(-0.0001,0.0001,-0.0001,0.0001,this.camera.near,this.camera.far);
5127 		this.camera.pMatrix=this.pickPMatrix;
5128 		gl.viewport(0,0,8,1);
5129 		gl.clear(gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
5130 		gl.disable(gl.BLEND);
5131 		gl.scene=this;
5132 		var objects=this.getObjects();
5133 		for(var i=0; i<objects.length;i++){
5134 			if(objects[i].pickable) objects[i].GLRender(gl,GLGE.RENDER_PICK,i+1);
5135 		}
5136 		gl.flush();
5137 
5138 		var data = new Uint8Array(8 * 1 * 4);
5139 		gl.readPixels(0, 0, 8, 1, gl.RGBA,gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
5140 		
5141 		
5142 		var norm=[data[4]/255,data[5]/255,data[6]/255];
5143 		var normalsize=Math.sqrt(norm[0]*norm[0]+norm[1]*norm[1]+norm[2]*norm[2])*0.5;
5144 		norm=[norm[0]/normalsize-1,norm[1]/normalsize-1,norm[2]/normalsize-1];
5145 		var obj=objects[data[0]+data[1]*256+data[2]*65536-1];
5146 		
5147 		var dist=(data[10]/255+0.00390625*data[9]/255+0.0000152587890625*data[8]/255)*this.camera.far;
5148 		var tex=[];
5149 		tex[0]=(data[14]/255+0.00390625*data[13]/255+0.0000152587890625*data[12]/255);
5150 		tex[1]=(data[18]/255+0.00390625*data[17]/255+0.0000152587890625*data[16]/255);
5151 		
5152 				
5153 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
5154 		gl.viewport(0,0,this.renderer.canvas.width,this.renderer.canvas.height);
5155 		
5156 		//revert the view matrix
5157 		this.camera.matrix=origmatrix;	
5158 		this.camera.pMatrix=origpmatrix;
5159 		return {object:obj,distance:dist,coord:[origin[0]-direction[0]*dist,origin[1]-direction[1]*dist,origin[2]-direction[2]*dist],normal:norm,texture:tex};
5160 }
5161 
5162 /**
5163 * Picks and object from canvas coords
5164 * @param x the canvas x coord to pick
5165 * @param y the canvas y coord to pick
5166 */
5167 GLGE.Scene.prototype.pick=function(x,y){
5168 	if(!this.camera){
5169 		GLGE.error("No camera set for picking");
5170 		return false;
5171 	}else if(this.camera.matrix && this.camera.pMatrix){
5172 		xcoord =  -( ( ( 2 * x ) / this.renderer.canvas.width ) - 1 ) / this.camera.pMatrix[0];
5173 		ycoord =( ( ( 2 * y ) / this.renderer.canvas.height ) - 1 ) / this.camera.pMatrix[5];
5174 		zcoord =  1;
5175 		var coord=[xcoord,ycoord,zcoord,0];
5176 		coord=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(GLGE.inverseMat4(this.camera.matrix),coord);
5177 		var cameraPos=this.camera.getPosition();
5178 		var origin=[cameraPos.x,cameraPos.y,cameraPos.z];
5179 		return this.ray(origin,coord);
5180 		
5181 	}else{
5182 		return false;
5183 	}
5184 	
5185 }
5186 
5187 /**
5188 * @class Sets the scene to render
5189 * @param {GLGE.Scene} scene The scene to be rendered
5190 */
5191 GLGE.Renderer=function(canvas,error){
5192 	this.canvas=canvas;
5193 	try {
5194 		this.gl = canvas.getContext("experimental-webgl",{alpha:true,depth:true,stencil:true,antialias:true,premultipliedAlpha:true});
5195 	} catch(e) {}
5196 	if(!this.gl) {
5197 		if(!error){
5198 			var div=document.createElement("div");
5199 			div.setAttribute("style","position: absolute; top: 10px; left: 10px; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; padding: 10px;background-color: #fcffcb;color: #800; width: 200px; border:2px solid #f00");
5200 			div.innerHTML="Cannot detect webgl please download a compatible browser";
5201 			document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(div);
5202 			throw "cannot create webgl context";
5203 		}else{
5204 			error();
5205 			throw "cannot create webgl context";
5206 		}
5207 	}
5208 	//firefox is doing something here?
5209 	try{
5210 	this.gl.canvas=canvas;
5211 	}catch(e){};
5212 	//this.gl = WebGLDebugUtils.makeDebugContext(this.gl);
5213 	//this.gl.setTracing(true);
5214 
5215 	//chome compatibility
5216 	//TODO: Remove this when chome is right
5217 	if (!this.gl.getProgramParameter)
5218 	{
5219 		this.gl.getProgramParameter = this.gl.getProgrami
5220 	}
5221 	if (!this.gl.getShaderParameter)
5222 	{
5223 		this.gl.getShaderParameter = this.gl.getShaderi
5224 	}
5225 	// End of Chrome compatibility code
5226 	
5227 	this.gl.uniformMatrix4fvX=this.gl.uniformMatrix4fv
5228 	this.gl.uniformMatrix4fv=function(uniform,transpose,array){
5229 		if(!transpose){
5230 			this.uniformMatrix4fvX(uniform,false,array);
5231 		}else{
5232 			GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(array),array);
5233 			this.uniformMatrix4fvX(uniform,false,array);
5234 		}
5235 	}
5236 	var gl=this.gl;
5237 	
5238 	/*this.gl.texImage2Dx=this.gl.texImage2D;
5239 	this.gl.texImage2D=function(){
5240 		if(arguments.length==9){
5241 			gl.texImage2Dx(arguments[0], arguments[1], arguments[2],arguments[3],arguments[4],arguments[5],arguments[6],arguments[7],arguments[8]);
5242 		}else{
5243 			gl.texImage2Dx(arguments[0], arguments[1], arguments[5],false,false);
5244 		}
5245 	}*/
5246 
5247 	
5248 	//set up defaults
5249 	this.gl.clearDepth(1.0);
5250 	this.gl.clearStencil(0);
5251 	this.gl.enable(this.gl.DEPTH_TEST);
5252     
5253 	//this.gl.enable(this.gl.CULL_FACE);
5254     
5255 	this.gl.depthFunc(this.gl.LEQUAL);
5256 	this.gl.blendFuncSeparate(this.gl.SRC_ALPHA,this.gl.ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA,this.gl.ZERO,this.gl.ONE);	
5257 };
5258 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.gl=null;
5259 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.scene=null;
5260 /**
5261 * Gets the scene which is set to be rendered
5262 * @returns the current render scene
5263 */
5264 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getScene=function(){
5265 	return this.scene;
5266 };
5267 /**
5268 * Sets the scene to render
5269 * @param {GLGE.Scene} scene The scene to be rendered
5270 */
5271 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setScene=function(scene){
5272 	scene.renderer=this;
5273 	this.scene=scene;
5274 	scene.GLInit(this.gl);
5275 	return this;
5276 };
5277 /**
5278 * Renders the current scene to the canvas
5279 */
5280 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.render=function(){
5281 	this.scene.render(this.gl);
5282 	//if this is the first ever pass then render twice to fill shadow buffers
5283 	if(!this.rendered){
5284 		this.scene.render(this.gl);
5285 		this.rendered=true;
5286 	}
5287 };
5288 
5289 
5290 /**
5291 * @class A texture to be included in a material
5292 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
5293 * @see GLGE.Material
5294 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5295 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5296 */
5297 GLGE.Texture=function(uid){
5298 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5299 }
5300 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Texture);
5301 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Texture);
5302 GLGE.Texture.prototype.className="Texture";
5303 GLGE.Texture.prototype.image=null;
5304 GLGE.Texture.prototype.glTexture=null;
5305 GLGE.Texture.prototype.url=null;
5306 /**
5307 * Gets the textures used by the layer
5308 * @return {string} The textures image url
5309 */
5310 GLGE.Texture.prototype.getSrc=function(){
5311 	return this.url;
5312 };
5313 
5314 /**
5315 * Sets the textures image location
5316 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5317 */
5318 GLGE.Texture.prototype.setSrc=function(url){
5319 	this.url=url;
5320 	this.state=0;
5321 	this.image=new Image();
5322 	var texture=this;
5323 	this.image.onload = function(){
5324 		texture.state=1;
5325 	}	
5326 	this.image.src=url;	
5327 	if(this.glTexture && this.gl){
5328 		this.gl.deleteTexture(this.glTexture);
5329 		this.glTexture=null;
5330 	}
5331 	return this;
5332 };
5333 
5334 /**
5335 * Sets the textures image location
5336 * @private
5337 **/
5338 GLGE.Texture.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
5339 	this.gl=gl;
5340 	//create the texture if it's not already created
5341 	if(!this.glTexture) this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
5342 	//if the image is loaded then set in the texture data
5343 	if(this.state==1){
5344 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5345 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE,this.image);
5346 		gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5347 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
5348 		this.state=2;
5349 	}
5350 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5351 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5352 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
5353 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_S, gl.REPEAT);
5354 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_T, gl.REPEAT);
5355 	
5356 	if(this.state==2) return true;
5357 		else return false;
5358 }
5359 
5360 /**
5361 * @class A canvase texture to be included in a material
5362 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
5363 * @see GLGE.Material
5364 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5365 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5366 */
5367 GLGE.TextureCanvas=function(uid){
5368 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5369 	this.canvas=document.createElement("canvas");
5370 }
5371 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureCanvas);
5372 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureCanvas);
5373 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.className="TextureCanvas";
5374 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.glTexture=null;
5375 /**
5376 * Gets the canvas used by the texture
5377 * @return {canvas} The textures image url
5378 */
5379 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getCanvas=function(){
5380 	return this.canvas;
5381 };
5382 /**
5383 * Sets the canvas used by the texture
5384 * @param {canvas} canvas The canvas to use
5385 */
5386 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setCanvas=function(canvas){
5387 	this.canvas=canvas;
5388 	return this;
5389 };
5390 /**
5391 * Sets the canvas height
5392 * @param {number} value The canvas height
5393 */
5394 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setHeight=function(value){
5395 	this.canvas.height=value;
5396 	return this;
5397 };
5398 /**
5399 * Sets the canvas width
5400 * @param {number} value The canvas width
5401 */
5402 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setWidth=function(value){
5403 	this.canvas.width=value;
5404 	return this;
5405 };
5406 
5407 /**
5408 * gets the canvas height
5409 * @returns {number} The canvas height
5410 */
5411 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getHeight=function(){
5412 	return this.canvas.height;
5413 };
5414 /**
5415 * gets the canvas width
5416 * @returns {number} The canvas width
5417 */
5418 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getWidth=function(){
5419 	return this.canvas.width;
5420 };
5421 
5422 /**
5423 * does the canvas texture GL stuff
5424 * @private
5425 **/
5426 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
5427 	this.gl=gl;
5428 	//create the texture if it's not already created
5429 	if(!this.glTexture){
5430 		this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
5431 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5432 		this.updateCanvas(gl);
5433 	}else{
5434 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5435 		this.updateCanvas(gl);
5436 	}
5437 
5438 	
5439 	return true;
5440 }
5441 /**
5442 * Updates the canvas texture
5443 * @private
5444 */
5445 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.updateCanvas=function(gl){
5446 	var canvas = this.canvas;
5447 	
5448 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5449 	//TODO: fix this when minefield is upto spec
5450 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas);}
5451 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas,null);}
5452 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5453 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5454 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5455 }
5456 
5457 
5458 /**
5459 * @class A video texture to be included in a material
5460 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
5461 * @see GLGE.Material
5462 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5463 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5464 */
5465 GLGE.TextureVideo=function(uid){
5466 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5467 	this.video=document.createElement("video");
5468 	this.video.style.display="none";
5469 	this.video.setAttribute("loop","loop");
5470 	this.video.autoplay=true;
5471 	//looping isn't working in firefox so quick fix!
5472 	this.video.addEventListener("ended", function() { this.play(); }, true); 
5473 	//video needs to be part of page to work for some reason :-s
5474 	document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(this.video);
5475 	//used to get webkit working
5476 	this.canvas=document.createElement("canvas");
5477 	this.ctx=this.canvas.getContext("2d");
5478 	
5479 }
5480 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureVideo);
5481 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureVideo);
5482 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.className="TextureVideo";
5483 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.glTexture=null;
5484 /**
5485 * Gets the canvas used by the texture
5486 * @return {video} The textures image url
5487 */
5488 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.getVideo=function(){
5489 	return this.video;
5490 };
5491 /**
5492 * Sets the video used by the texture
5493 * @param {video} canvas The canvas to use
5494 */
5495 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.setVideo=function(video){
5496 	this.video=video;
5497 	return this;
5498 };
5499 
5500 /**
5501 * Sets the source used for the video
5502 * @param {string} src The URL of the video
5503 */
5504 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.setSrc=function(src){
5505 	this.video.src=src;
5506 	return this;
5507 };
5508 /**
5509 * gets the source used for the video
5510 * @returns {string} The URL of the video
5511 */
5512 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.getSrc=function(src){
5513 	return this.video.src;
5514 };
5515 
5516 /**
5517 * does the canvas texture GL stuff
5518 * @private
5519 **/
5520 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
5521 	this.gl=gl;
5522 	//create the texture if it's not already created
5523 	if(!this.glTexture){
5524 		this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
5525 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5526 		this.updateTexture(gl);
5527 	}else{
5528 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5529 		this.updateTexture(gl);
5530 	}
5531 
5532 	
5533 	return true;
5534 }
5535 /**
5536 * Updates the canvas texture
5537 * @private
5538 */
5539 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.updateTexture=function(gl){
5540 	var video = this.video;
5541 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5542 	//TODO: fix this when minefield is upto spec
5543 	if(video.readyState>0){
5544 	if(video.height<=0){
5545 		video.style.display="";
5546 		video.height=video.offsetHeight;
5547 		video.width=video.offsetWidth;
5548 		video.style.display="none";
5549 	}
5550 	this.canvas.height=video.height;
5551 	this.canvas.width=video.width;
5552 	this.ctx.drawImage(video, 0, 0);
5553 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.canvas);}
5554 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.canvas,null);}
5555 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5556 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5557 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5558 	
5559 	/*
5560 	use when video is working in webkit
5561 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, video);}
5562 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, video,null);}
5563 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5564 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5565 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5566 	*/
5567 	}
5568 }
5569 
5570 
5571 
5572 /**
5573 * @class A reflection texture will reflect in a plane for a specified transform
5574 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
5575 * @see GLGE.Material
5576 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5577 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5578 */
5579 GLGE.TextureCamera=function(uid){
5580 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5581 }
5582 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureCamera);
5583 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureCamera);
5584 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.className="Texture";
5585 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.texture=null;
5586 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.glTexture=null;
5587 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.object=null;
5588 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.camera=null;
5589 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.bufferHeight=0;
5590 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.bufferWidth=0;
5591 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.mirrorAxis=GLGE.NONE;
5592 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.clipAxis=GLGE.NONE;
5593 
5594 /**
5595 * sets the RTT  render buffer width
5596 * @param {number} buffer width
5597 **/
5598 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setBufferWidth=function(width){
5599 	this.bufferWidth=width;
5600 	this.update=true;
5601 	return this;
5602 }
5603 /**
5604 * gets the RTT  render buffer width
5605 * @returns the width
5606 **/
5607 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getBufferWidth=function(){
5608 	return this.bufferWidth;
5609 }
5610 
5611 /**
5612 * sets the RTT  render buffer height
5613 * @param {number} buffer height
5614 **/
5615 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setBufferHeight=function(height){
5616 	this.bufferHeight=height;
5617 	this.update=true;
5618 	return this;
5619 }
5620 /**
5621 * gets the RTT  render buffer height
5622 * @returns the height
5623 **/
5624 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getBufferHeight=function(){
5625 	return this.bufferHeight;
5626 }
5627 
5628 /**
5629 * sets the RTT  clip axis
5630 * @param {number} the axis
5631 **/
5632 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setClipAxis=function(camera){
5633 	this.clipAxis=camera;
5634 	return this;
5635 }
5636 /**
5637 * gets the RTT clip axis
5638 * @returns the axis
5639 **/
5640 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getClipAxis=function(){
5641 	return this.clipAxis;
5642 }
5643 
5644 /**
5645 * sets the RTT  mirror axis
5646 * @param {number} the axis
5647 **/
5648 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setMirrorAxis=function(camera){
5649 	this.mirrorAxis=camera;
5650 	return this;
5651 }
5652 /**
5653 * gets the RTT mirror axis
5654 * @returns the axis
5655 **/
5656 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getMirrorAxis=function(){
5657 	return this.mirrorAxis;
5658 }
5659 
5660 /**
5661 * sets the RTT camera to use
5662 * @param {GLGE.Camera} the source camera
5663 **/
5664 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setCamera=function(camera){
5665 	this.camera=camera;
5666 	return this;
5667 }
5668 /**
5669 * gets the RTT source camera
5670 * @returns {GLGE.Camera} the source camera
5671 **/
5672 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getCamera=function(){
5673 	return this.camera;
5674 }
5675 
5676 /**
5677 * does what is needed to get the texture
5678 * @private
5679 **/
5680 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.doTexture=function(gl,object){
5681 	if(this.camera){
5682 		this.gl=gl;
5683 		var modelmatrix=object.getModelMatrix();
5684 		var pmatrix=gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
5685 		var cameramatrix=this.camera.getViewMatrix();
5686 		var matrix;
5687 		
5688 		if(this.mirrorAxis){
5689 			switch(this.mirrorAxis){
5690 				case GLGE.XAXIS:
5691 					matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameramatrix,modelmatrix),GLGE.scaleMatrix(-1,1,1)),GLGE.inverseMat4(modelmatrix));
5692 				break;
5693 				case GLGE.YAXIS:
5694 					matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameramatrix,modelmatrix),GLGE.scaleMatrix(1,-1,1)),GLGE.inverseMat4(modelmatrix));
5695 				break;
5696 				case GLGE.ZAXIS:
5697 					matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameramatrix,modelmatrix),GLGE.scaleMatrix(1,1,-1)),GLGE.inverseMat4(modelmatrix));
5698 				break;
5699 			}
5700 		}else{
5701 			matrix=cameramatrix;
5702 		}
5703 		
5704 		if(this.clipAxis){
5705 			var clipplane
5706 			switch(this.clipAxis){
5707 				case GLGE.NEG_XAXIS:
5708 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([-modelmatrix[0],-modelmatrix[4],-modelmatrix[8]]);
5709 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
5710 					break;
5711 				case GLGE.POS_XAXIS:
5712 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([modelmatrix[0],modelmatrix[4],modelmatrix[8]]);
5713 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
5714 					break;
5715 				case GLGE.NEG_YAXIS:
5716 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([-modelmatrix[1],-modelmatrix[5],-modelmatrix[9]]);
5717 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
5718 					break;
5719 				case GLGE.POS_YAXIS:
5720 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([modelmatrix[1],modelmatrix[5],modelmatrix[9]]);
5721 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
5722 					break;
5723 				case GLGE.NEG_ZAXIS:
5724 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([-modelmatrix[2],-modelmatrix[6],-modelmatrix[10]]);
5725 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)+0.001];
5726 					break;
5727 				case GLGE.POS_ZAXIS:
5728 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([modelmatrix[2],modelmatrix[6],modelmatrix[10]]);
5729 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)+0.001];
5730 					break;
5731 			}
5732 			
5733 			var itmvp=GLGE.transposeMat4(GLGE.inverseMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(pmatrix,matrix)));
5734 
5735 			clipplane=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(itmvp,clipplane);
5736 			clipplane=GLGE.scaleVec4(clipplane,pmatrix[10]);
5737 			clipplane[3] -= 1;
5738 			if(clipplane[2]<0) GLGE.scaleVec4(clipplane,-1);
5739 			var suffix=[ 1,0,0,0,
5740 					0,1,0,0,
5741 					clipplane[0],clipplane[1],clipplane[2],clipplane[3],
5742 					0,0,0,1];
5743 			pmatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(suffix,pmatrix);
5744 		}
5745 		var height=(!this.bufferHeight ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.height : this.bufferHeight);
5746 		var width=(!this.bufferWidth ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.width : this.bufferWidth);
5747 	
5748 		//create the texture if it's not already created
5749 		if(!this.glTexture || this.update){
5750 			this.createFrameBuffer(gl);
5751 			gl.scene.addRenderPass(this.frameBuffer,matrix, gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix(),width,height);
5752 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5753 			this.update=false;
5754 			return false;
5755 		}else{	
5756 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5757 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5758 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5759 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_S, gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
5760 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_T, gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
5761 			gl.scene.addRenderPass(this.frameBuffer,matrix, pmatrix,width,height);
5762 			return true;
5763 		}
5764 	}else{
5765 		return false;
5766 	}
5767 }
5768 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.registerPasses=GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.doTexture;
5769 /**
5770 * Creates the frame buffer for our texture
5771 * @private
5772 */
5773 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.createFrameBuffer=function(gl){
5774 	var height=(!this.bufferHeight ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.height : this.bufferHeight);
5775 	var width=(!this.bufferWidth ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.width : this.bufferWidth);
5776 	
5777 	if(!this.frameBuffer) this.frameBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
5778 	if(!this.renderBuffer) this.renderBuffer = gl.createRenderbuffer();
5779 	if(!this.glTexture) this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
5780 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
5781 
5782 	var tex = new Uint8Array(width*height*4);
5783 	gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, width,height, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
5784     
5785 	gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.frameBuffer);
5786     
5787 	gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
5788 	//dpeth stencil doesn't seem to work in either webkit or mozilla so don't use for now - reflected particles will be messed up!
5789 	//gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_STENCIL,width, height);
5790 	//gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
5791 	gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT16,width, height);
5792 	gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
5793     
5794 	gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture, 0);	
5795     
5796 	gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
5797 	gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
5798 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
5799 }
5800 
5801 
5802 
5803 
5804 /**
5805 * @class A texture to be included in a material
5806 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
5807 * @see GLGE.Material
5808 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5809 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5810 */
5811 GLGE.TextureCube=function(uid){
5812 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5813 }
5814 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureCube);
5815 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureCube);
5816 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.className="TextureCube";
5817 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.posX=null;
5818 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.negX=null;
5819 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.posY=null;
5820 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.negY=null;
5821 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.posZ=null;
5822 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.negZ=null;
5823 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.texture=null;
5824 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.glTexture=null;
5825 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.loadState=0;
5826 /**
5827 * Sets the url for a given image
5828 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5829 * @param {string} image the image element to load
5830 */
5831 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrc=function(url,image,mask){
5832 	this.url=url;
5833 	this.state=0;
5834 	this[image]=new Image();
5835 	var texture=this;
5836 	this[image].onload = function(){
5837 		texture.loadState+=mask;
5838 	}	
5839 	this[image].src=url;	
5840 	if(this.glTexture && this.gl) {
5841 		this.gl.deleteTexture(this.glTexture);
5842 		this.glTexture=null;
5843 	}
5844 	return this;
5845 }
5846 
5847 /**
5848 * Sets the positive X cube image
5849 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5850 */
5851 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcPosX=function(url){
5852 	this.setSrc(url,"posX",1);
5853 	return this;
5854 };
5855 /**
5856 * Sets the negative X cube image
5857 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5858 */
5859 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcNegX=function(url){
5860 	this.setSrc(url,"negX",2);
5861 	return this;
5862 };
5863 /**
5864 * Sets the positive Y cube image
5865 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5866 */
5867 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcPosY=function(url){
5868 	this.setSrc(url,"posY",4);
5869 	return this;
5870 };
5871 /**
5872 * Sets the negative Y cube image
5873 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5874 */
5875 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcNegY=function(url){
5876 	this.setSrc(url,"negY",8);
5877 	return this;
5878 };
5879 /**
5880 * Sets the positive Z cube image
5881 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5882 */
5883 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcPosZ=function(url){
5884 	this.setSrc(url,"posZ",16);
5885 	return this;
5886 };
5887 /**
5888 * Sets the negative Z cube image
5889 * @param {string} url the texture image url
5890 */
5891 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcNegZ=function(url){
5892 	this.setSrc(url,"negZ",32);
5893 	return this;
5894 };
5895 
5896 /**
5897 * Sets the textures image location
5898 * @private
5899 **/
5900 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
5901 	this.gl=gl;
5902 	//create the texture if it's not already created
5903 	if(!this.glTexture) this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
5904 	//if the image is loaded then set in the texture data
5905 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, this.glTexture);
5906 	if(this.loadState==63 && this.state==0){
5907 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.posX);
5908 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.negX);
5909 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.posY);
5910 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.negY);
5911 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Z, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.posZ);
5912 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Z, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.negZ);
5913 		gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP);
5914 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, null);
5915 		this.state=1;
5916 	}
5917 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, this.glTexture);
5918 	if(this.state==1) return true;
5919 		else return false;
5920 }
5921 
5922 
5923 /**
5924 * @class The material layer describes how to apply this layer to the material
5925 * @see GLGE.Material
5926 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
5927 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5928 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5929 * @augments GLGE.Events
5930 */
5931 GLGE.MaterialLayer=function(uid){
5932 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5933 	this.blendMode=GLGE.BL_MIX;
5934 };
5935 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
5936 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
5937 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
5938 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
5939 /**
5940  * @name GLGE.MaterialLayer#shaderupdated
5941  * @event Fires when a change will result in a change to the GLSL shader
5942  * @param {object} data
5943  */
5944  
5945 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.className="MaterialLayer";
5946 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.texture=null;
5947 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.blendMode=null;
5948 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.mapto=GLGE.M_COLOR;
5949 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.mapinput=GLGE.UV1;
5950 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleX=1;
5951 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetX=0;
5952 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotX=0;
5953 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleY=1;
5954 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetY=0;
5955 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotY=0;
5956 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleZ=1;
5957 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetZ=0;
5958 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotZ=0;
5959 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleX=0;
5960 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetX=0;
5961 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotX=0;
5962 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleY=0;
5963 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetY=0;
5964 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotY=0;
5965 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleZ=0;
5966 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetZ=0;
5967 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotZ=0;
5968 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.alpha=1;
5969 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.height=0.05;
5970 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.matrix=null;
5971 
5972 /**
5973 * Gets the textures used by the layer
5974 * @return {GLGE.Texture} The current shininess of the material
5975 */
5976 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMatrix=function(){
5977 	if(!this.matrix){
5978 		var offset=this.getOffset();
5979 		var scale=this.getScale();
5980 		var rotation=this.getRotation();
5981 		this.matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.translateMatrix(offset.x,offset.y,offset.z),GLGE.scaleMatrix(scale.x,scale.y,scale.z)),GLGE.rotateMatrix(rotation.x,rotation.y,rotation.z));
5982 	}
5983 	return this.matrix;
5984 };
5985 /**
5986 * Sets the height for this layer, currently only used for parallax mapping
5987 * @param {number} the height of this layer
5988 */
5989 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setHeight=function(value){
5990 	this.height=value;
5991 	return this;
5992 };
5993 /**
5994 * Gets the height for this layer, currently only used for parallax mapping
5995 * @return {number} the height of this layer
5996 */
5997 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getHeight=function(){
5998 	return this.height;
5999 };
6000 
6001 /**
6002 * Sets the textures alpha blending value
6003 * @param {number} the alpha for this layer
6004 */
6005 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setAlpha=function(value){
6006 	this.alpha=value;
6007 	return this;
6008 };
6009 /**
6010 * Gets the textures alpha blending value
6011 * @return {number} the alpha for this layer
6012 */
6013 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getAlpha=function(){
6014 	return this.alpha;
6015 };
6016 
6017 /**
6018 * Sets the textures used by the layer
6019 * @param {GLGE.Texture} value the teture to associate with this layer
6020 */
6021 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setTexture=function(value){
6022 	if(typeof value=="string")  value=GLGE.Assets.get(value);
6023 	this.texture=value;
6024 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6025 	return this;
6026 };
6027 /**
6028 * Gets the textures used by the layer
6029 * @return {GLGE.Texture} The current shininess of the material
6030 */
6031 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getTexture=function(){
6032 	return this.texture;
6033 };
6034 /**
6035 * Sets the flag for how this layer maps to the material
6036 * @param {Number} value the flags to set for this layer
6037 */
6038 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setMapto=function(value){
6039 	this.mapto=value;
6040 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6041 	return this;
6042 };
6043 /**
6044 * Gets the flag representing the way the layer maps to the material
6045 * @return {Number} The flags currently set for this layer
6046 */
6047 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMapto=function(){
6048 	return this.mapto;
6049 };
6050 /**
6051 * Sets the texture coordinate system
6052 * @param {Number} value the mapping to use
6053 */
6054 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setMapinput=function(value){
6055 	this.mapinput=value;
6056 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6057 	return this;
6058 };
6059 /**
6060 * Gets the texture coordinate system
6061 * @return {Number} The current mapping
6062 */
6063 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMapinput=function(){
6064 	return this.mapinput;
6065 };
6066 
6067 /**
6068 * Gets the layers texture offset
6069 * @return {object} the current offset
6070 */
6071 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffset=function(){
6072 	var offset={};
6073 	offset.x=parseFloat(this.getOffsetX())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetX());
6074 	offset.y=parseFloat(this.getOffsetY())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetY());
6075 	offset.z=parseFloat(this.getOffsetZ())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetZ());
6076 	return offset;
6077 };
6078 
6079 /**
6080 * Gets the layers texture rotation
6081 * @return {object} the current rotation
6082 */
6083 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotation=function(){
6084 	var rotation={};
6085 	rotation.x=parseFloat(this.getRotX())+parseFloat(this.getDRotX());
6086 	rotation.y=parseFloat(this.getRotY())+parseFloat(this.getDRotY());
6087 	rotation.z=parseFloat(this.getRotZ())+parseFloat(this.getDRotZ());
6088 	return rotation;
6089 };
6090 
6091 /**
6092 * Gets the layers texture scale
6093 * @return {object} the current scale
6094 */
6095 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScale=function(){
6096 	var scale={};
6097 	scale.x=parseFloat(this.getScaleX())+parseFloat(this.getDScaleX());
6098 	scale.y=parseFloat(this.getScaleY())+parseFloat(this.getDScaleY());
6099 	scale.z=parseFloat(this.getScaleZ())+parseFloat(this.getDScaleZ());
6100 	return scale;
6101 };
6102 
6103 /**
6104 * Sets the layers texture X offset
6105 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
6106 */
6107 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setOffsetX=function(value){
6108 	this.matrix=null;
6109 	this.offsetX=value;
6110 	return this;
6111 };
6112 /**
6113 * Gets the layers texture X offset
6114 * @return {Number} the current offset
6115 */
6116 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffsetX=function(){
6117 	return this.offsetX;
6118 };
6119 /**
6120 * Sets the layers texture Y offset
6121 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
6122 */
6123 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setOffsetY=function(value){
6124 	this.matrix=null;
6125 	this.offsetY=value;
6126 	return this;
6127 };
6128 /**
6129 * Gets the layers texture Y offset
6130 * @return {Number} the current offset
6131 */
6132 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffsetY=function(){
6133 	return this.offsetY;
6134 };
6135 /**
6136 * Sets the layers texture Z offset
6137 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
6138 */
6139 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setOffsetZ=function(value){
6140 	this.matrix=null;
6141 	this.offsetZ=value;
6142 	return this;
6143 };
6144 /**
6145 * Gets the layers texture Z offset
6146 * @return {Number} the current offset
6147 */
6148 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffsetZ=function(){
6149 	return this.offsetZ;
6150 };
6151 /**
6152 * Sets the layers texture X displacment offset, useful for animation
6153 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
6154 */
6155 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDOffsetX=function(value){
6156 	this.matrix=null;
6157 	this.dOffsetX=value;
6158 	return this;
6159 };
6160 /**
6161 * Gets the layers texture X displacment offset, useful for animation
6162 * @return {Number} the current offset
6163 */
6164 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDOffsetX=function(){
6165 	return this.dOffsetX;
6166 };
6167 /**
6168 * Sets the layers texture Y displacment offset, useful for animation
6169 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
6170 */
6171 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDOffsetY=function(value){
6172 	this.matrix=null;
6173 	this.dOffsetY=value;
6174 	return this;
6175 };
6176 /**
6177 * Gets the layers texture Y displacment offset, useful for animation
6178 * @return {Number} the current offset
6179 */
6180 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDOffsetY=function(){
6181 	return this.dOffsetY;
6182 };
6183 /**
6184 * Sets the layers texture Z displacment offset, useful for animation
6185 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
6186 */
6187 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDOffsetZ=function(value){
6188 	this.matrix=null;
6189 	this.dOffsetZ=value;
6190 	return this;
6191 };
6192 /**
6193 * Gets the layers texture X displacment offset, useful for animation
6194 * @return {Number} the current offset
6195 */
6196 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDOffsetZ=function(){
6197 	return this.dOffsetZ;
6198 };
6199 /**
6200 * Sets the layers texture X scale
6201 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
6202 */
6203 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setScaleX=function(value){
6204 	this.matrix=null;
6205 	this.scaleX=value;
6206 	return this;
6207 };
6208 /**
6209 * Gets the layers texture X scale
6210 * @return {Number} the current scale
6211 */
6212 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScaleX=function(){
6213 	return this.scaleX;
6214 };
6215 /**
6216 * Sets the layers texture Y scale
6217 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
6218 */
6219 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setScaleY=function(value){
6220 	this.matrix=null;
6221 	this.scaleY=value;
6222 	return this;
6223 };
6224 /**
6225 * Gets the layers texture Y scale
6226 * @return {Number} the current scale
6227 */
6228 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScaleY=function(){
6229 	return this.scaleY;
6230 };
6231 /**
6232 * Sets the layers texture Z scale
6233 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
6234 */
6235 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setScaleZ=function(value){
6236 	this.matrix=null;
6237 	this.scaleZ=value;
6238 	return this;
6239 };
6240 /**
6241 * Gets the layers texture Z offset
6242 * @return {Number} the current offset
6243 */
6244 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScaleZ=function(){
6245 	return this.scaleZ;
6246 };
6247 /**
6248 * Sets the layers texture X displacment scale, useful for animation
6249 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
6250 */
6251 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDScaleX=function(value){
6252 	this.matrix=null;
6253 	this.dScaleX=value;
6254 	return this;
6255 };
6256 /**
6257 * Gets the layers texture X displacment scale, useful for animation
6258 * @return {Number} the current scale
6259 */
6260 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDScaleX=function(){
6261 	return this.dScaleX;
6262 };
6263 /**
6264 * Sets the layers texture Y displacment scale, useful for animation
6265 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
6266 */
6267 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDScaleY=function(value){
6268 	this.matrix=null;
6269 	this.dScaleY=value;
6270 	return this;
6271 };
6272 /**
6273 * Gets the layers texture Y displacment scale, useful for animation
6274 * @return {Number} the current scale
6275 */
6276 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDScaleY=function(){
6277 	return this.dScaleY;
6278 };
6279 /**
6280 * Sets the layers texture Z displacment scale, useful for animation
6281 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
6282 */
6283 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDScaleZ=function(value){
6284 	this.matrix=null;
6285 	this.dScaleZ=value;
6286 	return this;
6287 };
6288 /**
6289 * Gets the layers texture X displacment scale, useful for animation
6290 * @return {Number} the current scale
6291 */
6292 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDScaleZ=function(){
6293 	return this.dScaleZ;
6294 };
6295 
6296 
6297 /**
6298 * Sets the layers texture X Rotation
6299 * @param {Number} value the amount to roate the texture
6300 */
6301 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setRotX=function(value){
6302 	this.matrix=null;
6303 	this.rotX=value;
6304 	return this;
6305 };
6306 /**
6307 * Gets the layers texture X rotate
6308 * @return {Number} the current rotate
6309 */
6310 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotX=function(){
6311 	return this.rotX;
6312 };
6313 /**
6314 * Sets the layers texture Y rotate
6315 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotate the texture
6316 */
6317 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setRotY=function(value){
6318 	this.matrix=null;
6319 	this.rotY=value;
6320 	return this;
6321 };
6322 /**
6323 * Gets the layers texture Y rotate
6324 * @return {Number} the current rotate
6325 */
6326 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotY=function(){
6327 	return this.rotY;
6328 };
6329 /**
6330 * Sets the layers texture Z rotate
6331 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotate the texture
6332 */
6333 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setRotZ=function(value){
6334 	this.matrix=null;
6335 	this.rotZ=value;
6336 	return this;
6337 };
6338 /**
6339 * Gets the layers texture Z rotate
6340 * @return {Number} the current rotate
6341 */
6342 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotZ=function(){
6343 	return this.rotZ;
6344 };
6345 /**
6346 * Sets the layers texture X displacment rotation, useful for animation
6347 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotation the texture
6348 */
6349 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDRotX=function(value){
6350 	this.matrix=null;
6351 	this.dRotX=value;
6352 	return this;
6353 };
6354 /**
6355 * Gets the layers texture X displacment rotation, useful for animation
6356 * @return {Number} the current rotation
6357 */
6358 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDRotX=function(){
6359 	return this.dRotX;
6360 };
6361 /**
6362 * Sets the layers texture Y displacment rotation, useful for animation
6363 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotaion the texture
6364 */
6365 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDRotY=function(value){
6366 	this.matrix=null;
6367 	this.dRotY=value;
6368 	return this;
6369 };
6370 /**
6371 * Gets the layers texture Y displacment rotation, useful for animation
6372 * @return {Number} the current rotation
6373 */
6374 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDRotY=function(){
6375 	return this.dRotY;
6376 };
6377 /**
6378 * Sets the layers texture Z displacment rotation, useful for animation
6379 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotation the texture
6380 */
6381 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDRotZ=function(value){
6382 	this.matrix=null;
6383 	this.dRotZ=value;
6384 	return this;
6385 };
6386 /**
6387 * Gets the layers texture X displacment rotation, useful for animation
6388 * @return {Number} the current rotation
6389 */
6390 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDRotZ=function(){
6391 	return this.dRotZ;
6392 };
6393 
6394 /**
6395 * Sets the layers blending mode
6396 * @param {Number} value the blend mode for the layer
6397 */
6398 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setBlendMode=function(value){
6399 	this.blendMode=value;
6400 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6401 	return this;
6402 };
6403 /**
6404 * Gets the layers tblending mode
6405 * @return {Number} the blend mode for the layer
6406 */
6407 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getBlendMode=function(){
6408 	return this.blendMode;
6409 };
6410 
6411 
6412 
6413 
6414 /**
6415 * @class The Material class creates materials to be applied to objects in the graphics engine
6416 * @see GLGE.Object
6417 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
6418 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6419 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
6420 * @augments GLGE.Events
6421 */
6422 GLGE.Material=function(uid){
6423 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
6424 	this.layers=[];
6425 	this.layerlisteners=[];
6426 	this.textures=[];
6427 	this.lights=[];
6428 	this.color={r:1,g:1,b:1,a:1};
6429 	this.specColor={r:1,g:1,b:1};
6430 	this.reflect=0.8;
6431 	this.shine=10;
6432 	this.specular=1;
6433 	this.emit=0;
6434 	this.alpha=1;
6435 };
6436 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Material);
6437 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Material);
6438 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Material);
6439 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.Material);
6440 
6441 
6442 /**
6443  * @name GLGE.Material#shaderupdate
6444  * @event fires when the shader for this material needs updating
6445  * @param {object} data
6446  */
6447 
6448 /**
6449 * @constant 
6450 * @description Flag for material colour
6451 */
6452 GLGE.M_COLOR=1; 
6453 /**
6454 * @constant 
6455 * @description Flag for material normal
6456 */
6457 GLGE.M_NOR=2;
6458 /**
6459 * @constant 
6460 * @description Flag for material alpha
6461 */
6462 GLGE.M_ALPHA=4; 
6463 /**
6464 * @constant 
6465 * @description Flag for material specular color
6466 */
6467 GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR=8; 
6468 /**
6469 * @constant 
6470 * @description Flag for material specular cvalue
6471 */
6472 GLGE.M_SPECULAR=16;
6473 /**
6474 * @constant 
6475 * @description Flag for material shineiness
6476 */
6477 GLGE.M_SHINE=32; 
6478 /**
6479 * @constant 
6480 * @description Flag for material reflectivity
6481 */
6482 GLGE.M_REFLECT=64;
6483 /**
6484 * @constant 
6485 * @description Flag for material emision
6486 */
6487 GLGE.M_EMIT=128;
6488 /**
6489 * @constant 
6490 * @description Flag for material alpha
6491 */
6492 GLGE.M_ALPHA=256;
6493 /**
6494 * @constant 
6495 * @description Flag for masking with textures red value
6496 */
6497 GLGE.M_MSKR=512;
6498 /**
6499 * @constant 
6500 * @description Flag for masking with textures green value
6501 */
6502 GLGE.M_MSKG=1024;
6503 /**
6504 * @constant 
6505 * @description Flag for masking with textures blue value
6506 */
6507 GLGE.M_MSKB=2048;
6508 /**
6509 * @constant 
6510 * @description Flag for masking with textures alpha value
6511 */
6512 GLGE.M_MSKA=4096;
6513 /**
6514 * @constant 
6515 * @description Flag for mapping of the height in parallax mapping
6516 */
6517 GLGE.M_HEIGHT=8192;
6518 
6519 /**
6520 * @constant 
6521 * @description Enumeration for first UV layer
6522 */
6523 GLGE.UV1=0;
6524 /**
6525 * @constant 
6526 * @description Enumeration for second UV layer
6527 */
6528 GLGE.UV2=1;
6529 /**
6530 * @constant 
6531 * @description Enumeration for normal texture coords
6532 */
6533 GLGE.MAP_NORM=3;
6534 
6535 /**
6536 * @constant 
6537 * @description Enumeration for object texture coords
6538 */
6539 GLGE.MAP_OBJ=4;
6540 
6541 /**
6542 * @constant 
6543 * @description Enumeration for reflection coords
6544 */
6545 GLGE.MAP_REF=5;
6546 
6547 /**
6548 * @constant 
6549 * @description Enumeration for environment coords
6550 */
6551 GLGE.MAP_ENV=6;
6552 
6553 /**
6554 * @constant 
6555 * @description Enumeration for view coords
6556 */
6557 GLGE.MAP_VIEW=7;
6558 
6559 /**
6560 * @constant 
6561 * @description Enumeration for mix blending mode
6562 */
6563 GLGE.BL_MIX=0;
6564 
6565 /**
6566 * @constant 
6567 * @description Enumeration for mix blending mode
6568 */
6569 GLGE.BL_MUL=1;
6570 	
6571 GLGE.Material.prototype.layers=null;
6572 GLGE.Material.prototype.className="Material";
6573 GLGE.Material.prototype.textures=null;
6574 GLGE.Material.prototype.color=null;
6575 GLGE.Material.prototype.specColor=null;
6576 GLGE.Material.prototype.specular=null;
6577 GLGE.Material.prototype.emit=null;
6578 GLGE.Material.prototype.shine=null;
6579 GLGE.Material.prototype.reflect=null;
6580 GLGE.Material.prototype.lights=null;
6581 GLGE.Material.prototype.alpha=null;
6582 GLGE.Material.prototype.shadow=true;
6583 /**
6584 * Sets the flag indicateing the material should or shouldn't recieve shadows
6585 * @param {boolean} value The recieving shadow flag
6586 */
6587 GLGE.Material.prototype.setShadow=function(value){
6588 	this.shadow=value;
6589 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6590 	return this;
6591 };
6592 /**
6593 * gets the show flag
6594 * @returns {boolean} The shadow flag
6595 */
6596 GLGE.Material.prototype.getShadow=function(value){
6597 	return this.shadow;
6598 };
6599 /**
6600 * Sets the base colour of the material
6601 * @param {string} color The colour of the material
6602 */
6603 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColor=function(color){
6604 	if(!color.r){
6605 		color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
6606 	}
6607 	this.color={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
6608 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6609 	return this;
6610 };
6611 /**
6612 * Sets the red base colour of the material
6613 * @param {Number} r The new red level 0-1
6614 */
6615 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorR=function(value){
6616 	this.color.r=value;
6617 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6618 	return this;
6619 };
6620 /**
6621 * Sets the green base colour of the material
6622 * @param {Number} g The new green level 0-1
6623 */
6624 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorG=function(value){
6625 	this.color.g=value;
6626 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6627 	return this;
6628 };
6629 /**
6630 * Sets the blue base colour of the material
6631 * @param {Number} b The new blue level 0-1
6632 */
6633 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorB=function(value){
6634 	this.color.b=value;
6635 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6636 	return this;
6637 };
6638 /**
6639 * Gets the current base color of the material
6640 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current base color
6641 */
6642 GLGE.Material.prototype.getColor=function(){
6643 	return this.color;
6644 };
6645 /**
6646 * Sets the base specular colour of the material
6647 * @param {string} color The new specular colour
6648 */
6649 GLGE.Material.prototype.setSpecularColor=function(color){
6650 	if(!color.r){
6651 		color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
6652 	}
6653 	this.specColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
6654 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6655 	return this;
6656 };
6657 /**
6658 * Gets the current base specular color of the material
6659 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current base specular color
6660 */
6661 GLGE.Material.prototype.getSpecularColor=function(){
6662 	return this.specColor;
6663 };
6664 /**
6665 * Sets the alpha of the material
6666 * @param {Number} value how much alpha
6667 */
6668 GLGE.Material.prototype.setAlpha=function(value){
6669 	this.alpha=value;
6670 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6671 	return this;
6672 };
6673 /**
6674 * Gets the alpha of the material
6675 * @return {Number} The current alpha of the material
6676 */
6677 GLGE.Material.prototype.getAlpha=function(){
6678 	return this.alpha;
6679 };
6680 /**
6681 * Sets the specular of the material
6682 * @param {Number} value how much specular
6683 */
6684 GLGE.Material.prototype.setSpecular=function(value){
6685 	this.specular=value;
6686 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6687 	return this;
6688 };
6689 /**
6690 * Gets the specular of the material
6691 * @return {Number} The current specular of the material
6692 */
6693 GLGE.Material.prototype.getSpecular=function(){
6694 	return this.specular;
6695 };
6696 /**
6697 * Sets the shininess of the material
6698 * @param {Number} value how much shine
6699 */
6700 GLGE.Material.prototype.setShininess=function(value){
6701 	this.shine=value;
6702 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6703 	return this;
6704 };
6705 /**
6706 * Gets the shininess of the material
6707 * @return {Number} The current shininess of the material
6708 */
6709 GLGE.Material.prototype.getShininess=function(){
6710 	return this.shine;
6711 };
6712 /**
6713 * Sets how much the material should emit
6714 * @param {Number} value how much to emit (0-1)
6715 */
6716 GLGE.Material.prototype.setEmit=function(value){
6717 	this.emit=value;
6718 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6719 	return this;
6720 };
6721 /**
6722 * Gets the amount this material emits
6723 * @return {Number} The emit value for the material
6724 */
6725 GLGE.Material.prototype.getEmit=function(){
6726 	return this.emit;
6727 };
6728 /**
6729 * Sets reflectivity of the material
6730 * @param {Number} value how much to reflect (0-1)
6731 */
6732 GLGE.Material.prototype.setReflectivity=function(value){
6733 	this.reflect=value;
6734 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6735 	return this;
6736 };
6737 /**
6738 * Gets the materials reflectivity
6739 * @return {Number} The reflectivity of the material
6740 */
6741 GLGE.Material.prototype.getReflectivity=function(){
6742 	return this.reflect;
6743 };
6744 
6745 /**
6746 * Add a new layer to the material
6747 * @param {MaterialLayer} layer The material layer to add to the material
6748 */
6749 GLGE.Material.prototype.addMaterialLayer=function(layer){
6750 	if(typeof layer=="string")  layer=GLGE.Assets.get(layer);
6751 	this.layers.push(layer);
6752 	var material=this;
6753 	var listener=function(event){
6754 		material.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6755 	};
6756 	this.layerlisteners.push(listener);
6757 	layer.addEventListener("shaderupdate",listener);
6758 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6759 	return this;
6760 };
6761 
6762 /**
6763 * Removes a layer from the material
6764 * @param {MaterialLayer} layer The material layer to remove
6765 */
6766 GLGE.Material.prototype.removeMaterialLayer=function(layer){
6767 	var idx=this.layers.indexOf(layer);
6768 	if(idx>=0){
6769 		this.layers.splice(idx,1);
6770 		layer.removeEventListener("shaderupdate",this.layerlisteners[idx]);
6771 		this.layerlisteners.splice(idx,1);
6772 		this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
6773 	}
6774 	return this;
6775 };
6776 
6777 /**
6778 * Gets all the materials layers
6779 * @returns {GLGE.MaterialLayer[]} all of the layers contained within this material
6780 */
6781 GLGE.Material.prototype.getLayers=function(){
6782 	return this.layers;
6783 };
6784 /**
6785 * Generate the code required to calculate the texture coords for each layer
6786 * @private
6787 */
6788 GLGE.Material.prototype.getLayerCoords=function(){
6789 		var shader=[];
6790 		shader.push("vec4 texturePos;\n"); 
6791 		for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
6792 			shader.push("textureCoords"+i+"=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"); 
6793 			
6794 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.UV1 || this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.UV2){
6795 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(vec2(UVCoord["+(this.layers[i].mapinput*2)+"],(1.0-UVCoord["+(this.layers[i].mapinput*2+1)+"])),1.0,1.0);\n");
6796 			}
6797 			
6798 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_NORM){
6799 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(normalize(n.xyz),1.0);\n");
6800 			}
6801 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_OBJ){
6802 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(normalize(OBJCoord.xyz),1.0);\n");
6803 			}
6804 			
6805 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_REF){
6806 				//will need to do in fragment to take the normal maps into account!
6807 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(reflect(normalize(eyevec.xyz),normalize(n.xyz)),1.0);\n");
6808 			}
6809 			
6810 
6811 			
6812 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_ENV){
6813 				//will need to do in fragment to take the normal maps into account!
6814 				shader.push("texturePos=envMat * vec4(reflect(normalize(eyevec.xyz),normalize(n.xyz)),1.0);\n");
6815 			}
6816 			
6817 			shader.push("textureCoords"+i+"=(layer"+i+"Matrix * texturePos).xyz;\n");			
6818 			
6819 		}
6820 		
6821 		return shader.join("");
6822 }
6823 /**
6824 * Generate the fragment shader program for this material
6825 * @private
6826 */
6827 GLGE.Material.prototype.getVertexVarying=function(){
6828 	var shader=[];
6829 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
6830 		shader.push("uniform mat4 layer"+i+"Matrix;\n");  
6831 		shader.push("varying vec3 textureCoords"+i+";\n"); 
6832 	}
6833 	return shader.join("");
6834 }
6835 
6836 GLGE.Material.prototype.registerPasses=function(gl,object){
6837 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
6838 		if(this.textures[i].registerPasses) this.textures[i].registerPasses(gl,object);
6839 	}
6840 }
6841 
6842 /**
6843 * Generate the fragment shader program for this material
6844 * @private
6845 */
6846 GLGE.Material.prototype.getFragmentShader=function(lights){
6847 	var shader="#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision mediump float;\n#endif\n";
6848 	var tangent=false;
6849 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
6850 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_POINT || lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT || lights[i].type==GLGE.L_DIR){
6851 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 lightvec"+i+";\n"; 
6852 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 tlightvec"+i+";\n"; 
6853 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 lightpos"+i+";\n"; 
6854 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 tlightdir"+i+";\n"; 
6855 			shader=shader+"varying float lightdist"+i+";\n";  
6856 			shader=shader+"varying vec2 spotCoords"+i+";\n"; 
6857 		}
6858 	}
6859 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 n;\n";  
6860 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 b;\n";  
6861 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 t;\n";  
6862 	shader=shader+"varying vec4 UVCoord;\n";
6863 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 eyevec;\n"; 
6864 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 OBJCoord;\n";
6865 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 teyevec;\n";
6866 
6867 	//texture uniforms
6868 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
6869 		if(this.textures[i].className=="Texture") shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
6870 		if(this.textures[i].className=="TextureCanvas") shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
6871 		if(this.textures[i].className=="TextureVideo") shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
6872 		if(this.textures[i].className=="TextureCube") shader=shader+"uniform samplerCube TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
6873 	}
6874 	
6875 	var cnt=0;
6876 	var shadowlights=[];
6877 	var num;
6878 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
6879 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightcolor"+i+";\n";  
6880 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightAttenuation"+i+";\n";  
6881 			shader=shader+"uniform float spotCosCutOff"+i+";\n";  
6882 			shader=shader+"uniform float spotExp"+i+";\n";  
6883 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightdir"+i+";\n";  
6884 			shader=shader+"uniform mat4 lightmat"+i+";\n";
6885 			shader=shader+"uniform float shadowbias"+i+";\n"; 
6886 			shader=shader+"uniform int shadowsamples"+i+";\n";  
6887 			shader=shader+"uniform float shadowsoftness"+i+";\n";  
6888 			shader=shader+"uniform bool castshadows"+i+";\n";  
6889 			shader=shader+"varying vec4 spotcoord"+i+";\n";  
6890 			if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow){
6891 				num=this.textures.length+(cnt++);
6892 				shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+num+";\n";
6893 				shadowlights[i]=num;
6894 			}
6895 	}
6896 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){		
6897 		shader=shader+"varying vec3 textureCoords"+i+";\n";
6898 		shader=shader+"uniform float layeralpha"+i+";\n";
6899 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_HEIGHT) == GLGE.M_HEIGHT){
6900 			shader=shader+"uniform float layerheight"+i+";\n";
6901 		}
6902 	}
6903 	
6904 	shader=shader+"uniform vec4 baseColor;\n";
6905 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 specColor;\n";
6906 	shader=shader+"uniform float shine;\n";
6907 	shader=shader+"uniform float specular;\n";
6908 	shader=shader+"uniform float reflective;\n";
6909 	shader=shader+"uniform float emit;\n";
6910 	shader=shader+"uniform float alpha;\n";
6911 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 amb;\n";
6912 	shader=shader+"uniform float fognear;\n";
6913 	shader=shader+"uniform float fogfar;\n";
6914 	shader=shader+"uniform int fogtype;\n";
6915 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 fogcolor;\n";
6916 	shader=shader+"uniform float far;\n";
6917 	shader=shader+"uniform mat4 worldInverseTranspose;\n"; 
6918 	shader=shader+"uniform mat4 projection;\n"; 
6919     
6920 	shader=shader+"void main(void)\n";
6921 	shader=shader+"{\n";
6922 	shader=shader+"float att;\n"; 
6923 	shader=shader+"int texture;\n"; 
6924 	shader=shader+"float mask=1.0;\n";
6925 	shader=shader+"float spec=specular;\n"; 
6926 	shader=shader+"vec3 specC=specColor;\n"; 
6927 	shader=shader+"vec4 view;\n"; 
6928 	shader=shader+"vec3 textureCoords=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"; 
6929 	shader=shader+"float ref=reflective;\n";
6930 	shader=shader+"float sh=shine;\n"; 
6931 	shader=shader+"float em=emit;\n"; 
6932 	shader=shader+"float al=alpha;\n"; 
6933 	shader=shader+"vec4 normalmap= vec4(n,0.0);\n"
6934 	shader=shader+"vec4 color = baseColor;"; //set the initial color
6935 	shader=shader+"float pheight=0.0;\n"
6936 	shader=shader+"vec3 textureHeight=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n";
6937 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
6938 		shader=shader+"textureCoords=textureCoords"+i+"+textureHeight;\n";
6939 		shader=shader+"mask=layeralpha"+i+"*mask;\n";
6940 		
6941 		if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_VIEW){
6942 			//will need to do in fragment to take the normal maps into account!
6943 			shader=shader+"view=projection * vec4(-eyevec,1.0);\n";
6944 			shader=shader+"textureCoords=view.xyz/view.w*0.5+0.5;\n";
6945 			shader=shader+"textureCoords=textureCoords+textureHeight;\n";
6946 		}
6947 			
6948 		if(this.layers[i].getTexture().className=="Texture" || this.layers[i].getTexture().className=="TextureCanvas"  || this.layers[i].getTexture().className=="TextureVideo" ){
6949 			var txcoord="xy";
6950 			var sampletype="2D";
6951 		}else{
6952 			var txcoord="xyz";
6953 			var sampletype="Cube";
6954 		}
6955 		
6956 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_COLOR) == GLGE.M_COLOR){			
6957 			if(this.layers[i].blendMode==GLGE.BL_MUL){
6958 				shader=shader+"color = color*(1.0-mask) + color*texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+")*mask;\n";
6959 			}
6960 			else 
6961 			{
6962 				shader=shader+"color = color*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+")*mask;\n";
6963 			}
6964 		}        
6965 		
6966 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_HEIGHT) == GLGE.M_HEIGHT){
6967 			//do paralax stuff
6968 			shader=shader+"pheight = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").x;\n";
6969 			shader=shader+"textureHeight =vec3((layerheight"+i+"* (pheight-0.5)  * normalize(teyevec).xy*vec2(1.0,-1.0)),0.0);\n";
6970 		}
6971 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR) == GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR){
6972 			shader=shader+"specC = specC*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").rgb*mask;\n";
6973 		}
6974 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKR) == GLGE.M_MSKR){
6975 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").r;\n";
6976 		}
6977 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKG) == GLGE.M_MSKG){
6978 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").g;\n";
6979 		}
6980 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKB) == GLGE.M_MSKB){
6981 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").b;\n";
6982 		}
6983 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKA) == GLGE.M_MSKA){
6984 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").a;\n";
6985 		}
6986 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SPECULAR) == GLGE.M_SPECULAR){
6987 			shader=shader+"spec = spec*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").r*mask;\n";
6988 		}
6989 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_REFLECT) == GLGE.M_REFLECT){
6990 			shader=shader+"ref = ref*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").g*mask;\n";
6991 		}
6992 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SHINE) == GLGE.M_SHINE){
6993 			shader=shader+"sh = sh*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").b*mask*255.0;\n";
6994 		}
6995 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_EMIT) == GLGE.M_EMIT){
