6996 			shader=shader+"em = em*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").r*mask;\n";
6997 		}
6998 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_NOR) == GLGE.M_NOR){
6999 			shader=shader+"normalmap = normalmap*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+")*mask;\n";
7000 			tangent=true;
7001 		}
7002 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_ALPHA) == GLGE.M_ALPHA){
7003 			shader=shader+"al = al*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").a*mask;\n";
7004 		}
7005 	}		
7006 	if(tangent){
7007 		shader=shader+"vec3 normal = normalize(normalmap.rgb)*2.0-1.0;\n";
7008 	}else{
7009 		shader=shader+"vec3 normal = normalize(n);\n";
7010 	}
7011 
7012 	shader=shader+"vec3 lightvalue=amb;\n"; 
7013 	shader=shader+"vec3 specvalue=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"; 
7014 	shader=shader+"float dotN,spotEffect;";
7015 	shader=shader+"vec3 lightvec=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
7016 	shader=shader+"vec3 viewvec=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
7017 	shader=shader+"float spotmul=0.0;";
7018 	shader=shader+"float spotsampleX=0.0;";
7019 	shader=shader+"float spotsampleY=0.0;";
7020 	shader=shader+"float totalweight=0.0;";
7021 	shader=shader+"int cnt=0;";
7022 	shader=shader+"vec2 spotoffset=vec2(0.0,0.0);";
7023 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
7024 	
7025 		if(tangent){
7026 			shader=shader+"lightvec=tlightvec"+i+"*vec3(-1.0,-1.0,1.0);\n";  
7027 			shader=shader+"normal.z=(normal.z+1.0)/2.0;\n";  
7028 			shader=shader+"viewvec=teyevec*vec3(-1.0,-1.0,1.0);\n";  
7029 		}else{
7030 			shader=shader+"lightvec=lightvec"+i+";\n";  
7031 			shader=shader+"viewvec=eyevec;\n"; 
7032 		}
7033 		
7034 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_POINT){ 
7035 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,normalize(-lightvec)),0.0);\n";       
7036 			shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
7037 			shader=shader+"att = 1.0 / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
7038 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
7039 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += att * dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
7040 			}
7041 			if(lights[i].specular){
7042 				shader=shader+"specvalue += att * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), sh);\n";
7043 			}
7044 			
7045 			shader=shader+"}\n";
7046 			
7047 			
7048 		}
7049 		shader=shader+"spotEffect = 0.0;\n";
7050 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT){
7051 			shader=shader+"spotEffect = dot(normalize(lightdir"+i+"), normalize(-lightvec"+i+"));";	
7052 			shader=shader+"if (spotEffect > spotCosCutOff"+i+") {\n";		
7053 			shader=shader+"spotEffect = pow(spotEffect, spotExp"+i+");";
7054 			//spot shadow stuff
7055 			if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow){
7056 				shader=shader+"if(castshadows"+i+"){\n";
7057 				shader=shader+"vec4 dist=texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", (((spotcoord"+i+".xy)/spotcoord"+i+".w)+1.0)/2.0);\n";
7058 				shader=shader+"float depth = dot(dist, vec4(0.000000059604644775390625,0.0000152587890625,0.00390625,1.0))*10000.0;\n";
7059 				shader=shader+"spotmul=0.0;\n";
7060 				shader=shader+"totalweight=0.0;\n";
7061 				shader=shader+"if((depth+shadowbias"+i+"-length(lightvec"+i+"))<0.0) {spotmul=1.0; totalweight=1.0;}\n";
7062 				shader=shader+"if(shadowsamples"+i+">0){\n";
7063 					shader=shader+"for(cnt=0; cnt<4; cnt++){;\n";
7064 						shader=shader+"spotsampleX=-0.707106781;spotsampleY=-0.707106781;\n"; 
7065 						shader=shader+"if(cnt==0 || cnt==3) spotsampleX=0.707106781;\n"; 
7066 						shader=shader+"if(cnt==1 || cnt==3) spotsampleY=0.707106781;\n"; 
7067 						shader=shader+"spotoffset=vec2(spotsampleX,spotsampleY)*0.5;\n";
7068 						shader=shader+"dist=texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", (((spotcoord"+i+".xy)/spotcoord"+i+".w)+1.0)/2.0+spotoffset*shadowsoftness"+i+");\n";
7069 						shader=shader+"depth = dot(dist, vec4(0.000000059604644775390625,0.0000152587890625,0.00390625,1.0))*100.0;\n";
7070 						shader=shader+"if((depth+shadowbias"+i+"-length(lightvec"+i+"))<0.0){\n";
7071 						shader=shader+"spotmul+=length(spotoffset);\n";
7072 						shader=shader+"}\n";
7073 						shader=shader+"totalweight+=length(spotoffset);\n";
7074 					shader=shader+"};\n";
7075 				shader=shader+"};\n";
7076 				shader=shader+"if(totalweight!=spotmul){\n";
7077 					shader=shader+"spotmul=0.0;\n";
7078 					shader=shader+"totalweight=0.0;\n";
7079 					shader=shader+"for(cnt=0; cnt<shadowsamples"+i+"*2; cnt++){;\n";
7080 						shader=shader+"spotsampleX=(fract(sin(dot(spotcoord"+i+".xy + vec2(float(cnt)),vec2(12.9898,78.233))) * 43758.5453)-0.5)*2.0;\n"; //generate random number
7081 						shader=shader+"spotsampleY=(fract(sin(dot(spotcoord"+i+".yz + vec2(float(cnt)),vec2(12.9898,78.233))) * 43758.5453)-0.5)*2.0;\n"; //generate random number
7082 						shader=shader+"spotoffset=vec2(spotsampleX,spotsampleY);\n";
7083 						shader=shader+"dist=texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", (((spotcoord"+i+".xy)/spotcoord"+i+".w)+1.0)/2.0+spotoffset*shadowsoftness"+i+");\n";
7084 						shader=shader+"depth = dot(dist, vec4(0.000000059604644775390625,0.0000152587890625,0.00390625,1.0))*100.0;\n";
7085 						shader=shader+"if((depth+shadowbias"+i+"-length(lightvec"+i+"))<0.0){\n";
7086 						shader=shader+"spotmul+=length(spotoffset);\n";
7087 						shader=shader+"}\n";
7088 						shader=shader+"totalweight+=length(spotoffset);\n";
7089 					shader=shader+"};\n";
7090 				shader=shader+"}\n";
7091 				
7092 				shader=shader+"if(totalweight>0.0) spotEffect=spotEffect*pow(1.0-spotmul/totalweight,3.0);\n";
7093 				shader=shader+"}";
7094 			}
7095 
7096 			
7097 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,normalize(-lightvec)),0.0);\n";       
7098 			shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
7099 			shader=shader+"att = spotEffect / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
7100 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
7101 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += att * dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
7102 			}
7103 			if(lights[i].specular){
7104 				shader=shader+"specvalue += att * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), sh);\n";
7105 			}
7106 			shader=shader+"}\n}\n";
7107 		}
7108 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_DIR){
7109 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,-normalize(lightvec)),0.0);\n";    
7110 			shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";			
7111 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
7112 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
7113 			}
7114 			if(lights[i].specular){
7115 				shader=shader+"specvalue += specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), sh);\n";
7116 			}
7117 			shader=shader+"}\n";
7118 		}
7119 	}
7120 	shader=shader+"float fogfact=1.0;";
7121 	shader=shader+"if(fogtype=="+GLGE.FOG_QUADRATIC+") fogfact=clamp(pow(max((fogfar - length(eyevec)) / (fogfar - fognear),0.0),2.0),0.0,1.0);\n";
7122 	shader=shader+"if(fogtype=="+GLGE.FOG_LINEAR+") fogfact=clamp((fogfar - length(eyevec)) / (fogfar - fognear),0.0,1.0);\n";
7123 	
7124 	shader=shader+"lightvalue = (lightvalue)*ref;\n";
7125 	shader=shader+"if(em>0.0){lightvalue=vec3(1.0,1.0,1.0);  fogfact=1.0;}\n";
7126 	shader=shader+"gl_FragColor =vec4(specvalue.rgb+color.rgb*(em+1.0)*lightvalue.rgb,al)*fogfact+vec4(fogcolor,al)*(1.0-fogfact);\n";
7127 	//shader=shader+"gl_FragColor =texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[0]+", (((spotcoord0.xy)/spotcoord"+i+".w)+1.0)/2.0+textureHeight);\n";
7128 
7129 	shader=shader+"}\n";
7130 	return shader;
7131 };
7132 /**
7133 * Set the uniforms needed to render this material
7134 * @private
7135 */
7136 GLGE.Material.prototype.textureUniforms=function(gl,shaderProgram,lights,object){
7137 	if(this.animation) this.animate();
7138 	if(shaderProgram.caches.baseColor!=this.color){
7139 		gl.uniform4f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "baseColor"), this.color.r,this.color.g,this.color.b,this.color.a);
7140 		shaderProgram.caches.baseColor=this.color;
7141 	}
7142 	if(shaderProgram.caches.specColor!=this.specColor){
7143 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "specColor"), this.specColor.r,this.specColor.g,this.specColor.b);
7144 		shaderProgram.caches.specColor=this.specColor;
7145 	}
7146 	if(shaderProgram.caches.specular!=this.specular){
7147 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "specular"), this.specular);
7148 		shaderProgram.caches.specular=this.specular;
7149 	}
7150 	if(shaderProgram.caches.shine!=this.shine){
7151 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shine"), this.shine);
7152 		shaderProgram.caches.shine=this.shine;
7153 	}
7154 	if(shaderProgram.caches.reflect!=this.reflect){
7155 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "reflective"), this.reflect);
7156 		shaderProgram.caches.reflect=this.reflect;
7157 	}
7158 	if(shaderProgram.caches.emit!=this.emit){
7159 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "emit"), this.emit);
7160 		shaderProgram.caches.emit=this.emit;
7161 	}
7162 	if(shaderProgram.caches.alpha!=this.alpha){
7163 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "alpha"), this.alpha);
7164 		shaderProgram.caches.alpha=this.alpha;
7165 	}
7166 	
7167 	var cnt=0;
7168 	var num=0;
7169 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
7170 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "lightcolor"+i), lights[i].color.r,lights[i].color.g,lights[i].color.b);
7171 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "lightAttenuation"+i), lights[i].constantAttenuation,lights[i].linearAttenuation,lights[i].quadraticAttenuation);
7172 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "spotCosCutOff"+i), lights[i].spotCosCutOff);
7173 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "spotExp"+i), lights[i].spotExponent);
7174 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shadowbias"+i), lights[i].shadowBias);
7175 		gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "castshadows"+i), lights[i].castShadows);
7176 		gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shadowsamples"+i), lights[i].samples);
7177 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shadowsoftness"+i), lights[i].softness);
7178 		    
7179 		//shadow code
7180 		if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow && this.emit==0) {
7181 			num=this.textures.length+(cnt++);
7182 			gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE"+num]);
7183 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, lights[i].texture);
7184 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
7185 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
7186 			gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
7187 		    
7188 			gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "TEXTURE"+num), num);
7189 		}
7190 	
7191 			
7192 	}
7193 	
7194 	if(!shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat) shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat=[];
7195 	
7196 
7197 			
7198 	var scale,offset;
7199 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
7200 		if(this.layers[i].animation) this.layers[i].animate();
7201 		scale=this.layers[i].getScale();
7202 		offset=this.layers[i].getOffset();		
7203 		if(!shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]) shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]=new Float32Array(this.layers[i].getMatrix());
7204 			else GLGE.mat4gl(this.layers[i].getMatrix(),shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]);	
7205 		
7206 		try{gl.uniformMatrix4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layer"+i+"Matrix"), true, shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]);}catch(e){}
7207 		
7208 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layeralpha"+i), this.layers[i].getAlpha());
7209 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layerheight"+i), this.layers[i].getHeight());
7210 	}
7211     
7212 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
7213 		
7214 			gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE"+i]);
7215 			if(this.textures[i].doTexture(gl,object)){
7216 			}
7217 			gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "TEXTURE"+i), i);
7218 	}	
7219 	
7220 };
7221 /**
7222 * Adds a new texture to this material
7223 * @param {String} image URL of the image to be used by the texture
7224 * @return {Number} index of the new texture
7225 */
7226 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture=function(texture){	
7227 	if(typeof texture=="string")  texture=GLGE.Assets.get(texture);
7228 	this.textures.push(texture);
7229 	texture.idx=this.textures.length-1;
7230 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7231 	return this;
7232 };
7233 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureCube=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
7234 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureCamera=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
7235 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureCanvas=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
7236 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureVideo=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
7237 
7238 
7239 
7240 
7241 /**
7242 * Closure Export
7243 */
7244 function closure_export(){
7245 if(GLGE.Message){
7246 	GLGE["Message"]=GLGE.Message;
7247 	GLGE.Message["parseMessage"]=GLGE.Message.parseMessage;
7248 }
7249 
7250 if(GLGE.Document){
7251 	GLGE["Document"]=GLGE.Document
7252 	GLGE.Document.prototype["getElementById"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.getElementById;
7253 	GLGE.Document.prototype["getElement"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.getElement;
7254 	GLGE.Document.prototype["load"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.load;
7255 	GLGE.Document.prototype["loadDocument"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.loadDocument;
7256 	GLGE.Document.prototype["onLoad"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.onLoad;
7257 	GLGE.Document.prototype["addLoadListener"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.addLoadListener;
7258 	GLGE.Document.prototype["removeLoadListener"]=GLGE.Document.prototype.removeLoadListener;
7259 }
7260 
7261 
7262 if(GLGE.Placeable){
7263 	GLGE["Placeable"]=GLGE.Placeable;
7264 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["getRoot"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.getRoot;
7265 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["getRef"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.getRef;
7266 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setId"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setId;
7267 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["getId"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.getId;
7268 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["getLookat"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.getLookat;
7269 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setLookat"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setLookat;
7270 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["Lookat"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.Lookat;
7271 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["getRotOrder"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.getRotOrder;
7272 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setRotOrder"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setRotOrder;
7273 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["getRotMatrix"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.getRotMatrix;
7274 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setRotMatrix"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setRotMatrix;
7275 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setLocX"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setLocX;
7276 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setLocY"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setLocY;
7277 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setLocZ"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setLocZ;
7278 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setLoc"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setLoc;
7279 	GLGE.Placeable.prototype["setDLocX"]=GLGE.Placeable.prototype.setDLocX;

7622 }

7644 
7645 if(GLGE.Material){
7646 	GLGE["Material"]=GLGE.Material;
7647 	GLGE.Material.prototype["className"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.className;
7648 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setShadow"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setShadow;
7649 	GLGE.Material.prototype["getShadow"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.getShadow;
7650 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setColor"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setColor;

7653 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setColorB"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorB;

7655 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setSpecularColor"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setSpecularColor;
7656 	GLGE.Material.prototype["getSpecularColor"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.getSpecularColor;
7657 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setAlpha"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setAlpha;
7658 	GLGE.Material.prototype["getAlpha"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.getAlpha;
7659 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setSpecular"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setSpecular;
7660 	GLGE.Material.prototype["getSpecular"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.getSpecular;
7661 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setShininess"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setShininess;

7663 	GLGE.Material.prototype["setEmit"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.setEmit;
7664 	GLGE.Material.prototype["getEmit"]=GLGE.Material.prototype.getEmit;
